description: Interpals Application for Android allows you to find penpals from anywhere in the world. You can visit their profile, watch and comment their photos, write on their wall, send them messages .... So if you are looking for foreign friends,language or cultural exchange, or even a relationship, this app is definitely for you. It is totally free and does not contain any ad. With a base a base of 1 million users, you will sure find interesting people to talk to, and in any language you want. The advanced search options are very useful to find potential new friends based on their age, sex, country, languages spoken etc ... This is an unofficial application for the website Interpals (www.interpals.net), the most popular penpal site on the web. You will need an account from this website to use the application. Features : * Advanced search options to find new Penfriends from all over the world * Browse users' profiles, walls, photo albums * Add comment on someone's wall or photo * Check who visited your profile recently * Add and remove people from your friends * Access to your messages and answer them from your phone * Receive a notification when you get a new message * Edit your status or your profile More to come in the next versions !
release_text: More functionalities - Wall to wall : (right click on a wall message) - Your message drafts are saved automatically. - block annoying users More convenient - Landscape mode now supported ! - You can now see on users profile which countries/age they accept messages from - You get a notification when you try to send a message to someone who doesn't accept messages from you. - You can hide the bottom bar when you don't need it - Text areas will now fit your text Better Design Many bug corrections

Die App für Blutspender - Alle Informationen zum Blutspenden an einem Ort Funktionen der Blutspende App: - Erhalte Erinnerungen, sobald du wieder Blut spenden darfst - Erhalte Benachrichtigungen, wenn deine Blutbank akuten Bedarf für deine Blutgruppe hat - Sehe wie hoch der Andrang in deiner Blutbank momentan ist anhand der aktuellen Wartezeit - Sehe wie lange du noch bis zur nächsten Blutspende warten musst - Überblicke die gesammelte Historie deiner Blutspenden - Verfolge Statistiken deiner Blutspenden - Wirb Freunde und verdiene Belohnungen (nur bei ausgewählten Blutbanken) - Sehe Blutspendezeiten und Kontaktdaten deiner Blutbank schnell ein The app for blood donors - all information about blood donations in one place Functions of blood donation app: - Receive reminders when you donate blood again allowed to - Receive notifications when your blood bank has acute need for your blood type - See how high the rush in your blood bank is currently based on the current waiting time - See how long you wait until the next blood donation must - Overviews the history of your collected blood donations - Follow your stats Blood donation - Recruit friends and earn rewards (Selected blood banks) - See Blood donation hours and contact your blood bank a fast

description: Fußball ist Begeisterung, ist Hingabe und Emotion. All dies kannst Du hautnah erleben – mit der offiziellen App des Deutschen Fußball-Bundes (DFB) die jetzt in neuem Gewand erstrahlt. Einfach installieren und alle News zu den Nationalmannschaften, den Wettbewerben, Ligen und vielen weiteren Aktivitäten des DFB landen immer blitzschnell auf Deinem Smartphone oder Tablet. Die Fans des deutschen Fußballs sind jetzt noch dichter dran: an den Nationalmannschaften, an den Partien der besten deutschen Ligen, an den verschiedensten Fußball-Veranstaltungen. Ob aktuelle News, Liveticker oder Videobereich – mit der DFB-App bist Du in Text, Bild und Video immer auf dem neusten Stand. Ob Team-Details, aktuelle Magazine oder das spannende Tippspiel – die ganze Welt des Fußballs passt jetzt in Deine Hosentasche. Die DFB-App bietet Dir einen Knaller nach dem anderen. Mit dem riesigen Videobereich entgeht Dir keine DFB-Veranstaltung. Ob Highlight-Berichte der Länderspiele, Zusammenfassungen der Spiele um den DFB-Pokal, das Beste aus der 3. Liga, die Junioren-Bundesliga, die Frauen-Bundesliga oder die sozialen Aktivitäten. Mit dieser App hast Du nicht nur das Gefühl live dabei zu sein – Du bist es tatsächlich. Denn über die DFB-App sind auch die Live-Events des Videokanals DFB-TV verfügbar. Und mit den Videos aus den Quartieren der deutschen Nationalmannschaften wird jedes Länderspiel für Dich zu einer einzigartigen Erfahrung. Per Video ziehst Du mit Manuel Neuer, Mario Götze, Alexandra Popp oder Simone Laudehr ein in die Teamhotels der A- und der Frauen-Nationalmannschaft. Tauche ein in die Welt der Nationalmannschaften, lasse Dich faszinieren von den Emotionen und fühle Dich als Teil der größten Fan-Gemeinde. Die DFB-App ist ein Muss für alle schwarz-rot-goldenen Fußball-Fans. Aktuelle Informationen, exklusive Interviews, interessante Hintergrundberichte und viele, viele Fakten. Hol' Dir die DFB-App, hol' Dir Emotion, Hingabe und Begeisterung auf Dein Smartphone! Football is enthusiasm, is devotion and emotion. All this you can experience at first hand - with the official app of the German Football Association (DFB) which now shines in a new guise. Just install and all news about the national teams, competitions, leagues and many other activities of the DFB always end up at lightning speed on your smartphone or tablet. The fans of German football are now even closer: to the national teams, the games of the best leagues in Germany, to a variety of football events. Whether the latest news, live ticker or video section - with the DFB app are you always up to date Whether team details, current magazines or the exciting betting game in text, image and video -. The whole world of football matches now in your pocket. The DFB app provides you with a bang after another. With the huge video section you will not miss any DFB event. Whether highlight reports of international matches, summaries of the matches of the DFB Cup, the best of the 3. Liga, the Junior League, the Women's Bundesliga or social activities. With this app, you have not only the feeling of being there live - you're actually there. Because on the DFB app also the live events of the video channel DFB-TV are available. And with the videos from the quarters of the German national teams will each international match for you a unique experience. Per video you draw with Manuel Neuer, Mario Götze, Alexandra Popp or Simone Laudehr a. In the team hotel the A and the women's national team Immerse yourself in the world of national teams, be thrilled by the emotion and feel like a part of the largest fan base. The DFB app is a must for all black-red-golden football fans. For the latest information, exclusive interviews, interesting background reports and many, many facts. Grab some the DFB app, Grab some emotion, devotion and enthusiasm on your Smartphone!
release_text: Danke, dass du die offizielle App des DFB nutzt. Wir möchten dir die Verbesserungen mit Version 2.0.6 vorstellen: - Es wurde ein Fehler behoben, bei dem nach dem Start der App nur mehr ein weißer Bildschirm angezeigt wurde. - Allgemein Bugfixes und Verbesserung der Stabilität.

description: Der Reiseführer mit den Insider-Tipps fürs Smartphone Die MARCO POLO Guides App ist der ideale Begleiter für Urlaub und Freizeit rund um die Themen “Inspirieren. Planen. Reisen." Lassen Sie sich von uns zu kleinen und großen Trips inspirieren. Features: - Reiseführer zu Ihrem Ziel: Ausführliche Informationen und Tipps zu 60.000 Reisezielen weltweit, kostenlos und in vollem Umfang nutzbar. - Aktuelle Informationen: Updates und News zu allen wichtigen Reisezielen online abrufbar. - “Locate me”-Funktion: Restaurants, Sehenswürdigkeiten und Ausflugs-Tipps in der direkten Umgebung finden. - Reise-Inspirator: Passende Reiseziele anhand der eigenen Bedürfnisse und Wünsche finden. - Planungs-Tools: Routenplaner & Reiseplaner erleichtern die Reisevorbereitung. - Verbesserte Performance: Geringerer Speicherplatzverbrauch, keine langen Reiseführer-Downloads notwendig. Bitte beachten: Während der Nutzung der MARCO POLO Guides App ist eine Internetverbindung erforderlich. Die App enthält keine Offline-Daten und belegt somit kaum Gerätespeicherplatz. Nur die tatsächlich aufgerufenen Informationen werden geladen. Sie können unsere Online-Reiseführer auch direkt über den Browser aufrufen: www.marcopolo.de Lob, Kritik oder Verbesserungsvorschläge? Schrieben Sie uns bitte eine E-Mail an mobile.feedback@marcopolo.de mit dem Betreff “MARCO POLO Guides App” und Angabe Ihres Gerätes und Betriebssystems. Wir antworten gerne und kümmern uns um Ihr Anliegen. Bitte beachten Sie, dass wir Bewertungen und Fragen im App Store nicht kommentieren können. The travel guide with Insider Tips for Smartphone The MARCO POLO Guides App is the perfect companion for holidays and leisure around the themes "Inspire. To plan. Travel. "Let yourself be inspired by us to big and small trips. Features: - Travel to your destination: the world Detailed information and advice to 60,000 destinations, free and fully usable. - Latest News: Updates and News to all major destinations available online. - "Locate me" function: find restaurants, attractions and tour tips in the immediate vicinity. - Travel Rewards: find suitable destinations on the basis of their own needs and desires. - Planning tools: directions & route planner facilitate travel arrangements. - Improved performance: Reduced memory consumption, no long travel guide downloads necessary. Please note: While the use of MARCO POLO Guides app an internet connection is required. The app does not include off-line data and thus is hardly device memory space. Only the actually wanted information is loaded. You can access our online guide directly through the browser: www.marcopolo.de Praise, criticism or suggestions for improvement? Registered us an email to mobile.feedback@marcopolo.de with the subject "MARCO POLO Guides app" and an indication of your device and operating system. We like to respond and take care of your concerns. Please note that we can not comment on reviews and questions on the App Store.
release_text: Wir bedanken uns bei allen Usern für das umfangreiche Feedback zur App. Auf Grundlage dieser Vorschläge haben wir die MARCO POLO Guides App komplett überarbeitet und neu gestaltet. Das sind die wichtigsten Features: - Reiseführer zu 60.000 Reisezielen weltweit - Aktuelle Informationen online abrufbar - Restaurants, Sehenswürdigkeiten und Ausflugs-Tipps in der direkten Umgebung - Reise-Inspirator - Planungs-Tools (Routenplaner & Reiseplaner) - Verbesserte Performance

description: The MM-travel app is your personal travel guide with map, City Guide planners, insider info, and more - always available offline! Pick your city guide or guide, testing the app for free and discover the best app for the most popular destinations around the world! The situational travel app that understands your needs and adapts to it. city guides 2015: *Barcelona, Dublin, Istanbul, Cologne, Krakow, London, Lübeck und Travemünde, New York, Paris, Prague, St. Petersburg, Warsaw city guides 2014: * Berlin und Potsdam, Budapest, Hamburg, Copenhagen, Lisboa, Madrid, Mainz, Munich, Nuremberg-Fürth-Erlangen, Rome, Venice travel guides 2014: * Florence, Naples & Vesuvio coast, Mallorca, Rügen-Stralsund-Hiddensee, Sylt city guides 2013: * Amsterdam, Brussels, Dresden, Moskow, Salzburg, Vienna, 2012: Shanghai, Zagreb hiking guides 2012: * Alsace, Gomera, Madeira, Mallorca, Munich excursion mountains, Provence, Tenerife Special features: + Complete travel guide + *Usable completely offline* + Maps available offline including all info + GPS & compass for city guidance and walking tours + Extensively researched information for the most popular travel destinations + Interesting facts about the country and culture + City Live! for your very own personal city guide + No transfer or roaming fees + Use Easy Jump! to switch easily between text and map + Situation-related recommendations + Live Weather! to help you make the best out of your trip Some content examples: + Excursions in the area + Eating & drinking + History + Small language tutor + Culture + Tours through the city + Shopping & fashion The developments that have been made for this app were partially financed with funds from the 7th European Research Framework Program. The project is administered by the REA Research Executive Agency under application number "FP7-SME-2012 -315333" ( http://cordis.europa.eu/fp ). Publisher information: Michael Müller Verlag is a leading travel guide publisher with numerous years of experience in the area of travel and hiking guides. Its travel guides are always unique, informative, and entertaining, making every trip a memorable experience. http://apps.michael-mueller-verlag.de

description: How much is the cab home? Do I have enough money for a taxi? Or should I search for an ATM instead? You know these questions? Take a closer look at our Taxi-Calculator App! The Taxi-Calculator enables you to get a quick taxi fare estimation for your planned taxi trip. Just enter start and destination address of your planned trip and get your quote! • Independent and reliable calculation • More than 350 taxi fares from all over the world (>20 countries) • Seperated quotes for day and night trips • "Shortest" and "Fastest" option • GPS and map support • Direct call to many cab companies • Handy "Bring me home" function NEW: • New countries: Australia, Canada, China, Japan, South Africa, Belgium, Netherlands, India, Brasilia, Argentina, Turkey, Mexico • More detailled rate overview • Updated Design • Bugfixes
release_text: • now always displaying the rate during night (even if no night fare provided) • Bugfixes

description: Давно хотели узнать из чего состоит автомобиль? Теперь есть Авто-Помощник CarGuide,который всегда с Вами! В приложении 6 разделов посвященных устройству автомобиля,а именно: -Двигатель -Трансмиссия -Ходовая -Системы управления -Несущая и Электрооборудование -Картинки. С помощью CarGuide Вы узнаете: *Плюсы и минусы переднего,заднего приводов *Как происходит охлаждение ДВС *В чем преимущества подвески МакФерсон *Из чего состоит коробка передач и еще много нового. 've Always wanted to know what is in your car? Now there's Auto-Assistant CarGuide, which is always with you! Annex 6 sections devoted to car unit, namely: The engine -Transmission -Running -Control Systems -Supporting and Electrical -Pictures. With CarGuide you will learn: * The pros and cons of front-, rear-wheel drive * How is the engine cooling * What are the advantages suspension MacPherson * What is in the gearbox and a lot more.

description: Offers the fastest way for sending text masseges. You can predefine the text and the receiver and by one click on the widget the text is sent. (e.g. useful if you have to constantly remind someone of something! With that app your effort is minimized ;) Once configured, this is the fastest way to send sms from your homescreen! It's just one click! You can however configure the button to open the sms app with the predefined text filled in, in case you want to edit the text. Note: - Network permission is needed for the Admob adds in the confiuration screen. Sorry for that! - Its a widget and does not appear in the applications menu! - SMS do not appear in the normal chat window. - Currently in beta (User Interface is not final) Feedback appreciated! - Keep in mind that SMS might be expensive, so do not overwork that button ;)! Best used with a sms flatrate. - Have fun! Keywords: oneClick SMS, sms widget, sms button, direct SMS

description: الطب - اللغة الإنجليزية لقاموس عربي  - FREE Medicine English To Arabic Dictionary has 65,000 words. - Search the English word and it will display its Arabic translation. - "Search Options" feature that help to search the word "Starting" with searching word or "Ending" with searching word or "Containing" the searching word. - Audio Pronunciation of English Words. - Listen the Arabic sound of Words. - No need of Internet. Work offline without using Internet.

Medicine Recall is a free app for people who need help to keep track of your medication. With Medication Remember you can also help family members with their medication. Whether you take part medications at different times or just one tablet a day, it can be hard to remember. Once you have created a user, you can add medication to medication list. If you set a time for when to take the medicine, the app will send you a reminder when it is time to take the medicine. There is a special feature for those who take the pill. In the calendar you can get an overview of your daily medication use. You can also see if you have taken your medicine as directed. Feel your blood pressure, blood sugar or your weight, and you can write a note with a smiley indicating how your day has been compared to such. pain or mood. You can send content from your calendar to e-mail and such. take the information with your doctor. Subject Danish Pharmaceutical Association can not be held responsible for absent, failure or delay of reminders. Entering sensitive personal data is at the user's own risk. Danish Pharmaceutical Association can not be held responsible for lack of security at the individual cell phone, which may provide access to any sensitive personal information.

description: Block Koala is a puzzle game similar to Puyo Puyo where you have to join blocks of the same color to break it and get chain combos. You have 3 game ways: - Quick mode: unlimited time. - History mode: save your kiwi friends across 5 worlds of 4 stages each. - Time mode: you have 1 minute to get as many points as you can Get 60 stars and unlock 9 different medals Premium features: - No adds - Bigger play screen - You can download every kiwi pictures to your phone Tested on HTC Sensation, Samsung Galaxy SIII, Nexus 7 and Motorola Defy Review -> http://androjuegos.com/blockkoala-junta-los-bloques-del-mismo-color-y-salva-a-tus-amigos-los-kiwis/

Flying Sheep is a casual game to relax as yo travel the sky Try to get the higher altitude with your flying sheep. Clouds, bees, flowers or birds try to explode your balloons... tap on them to survive! Move left or right with the accelerometer. Good luck!

Play the classic Hot Potato with your friends, up to 8 players. Response the random questions and pass the device before the time runs out. Play with common time or different time for each player. Hot Potato is not an AI, players must be honest!

A funny game app for everybody. Tomato Man Dodge is a unique tilt based game of no-rules dodge ball. Tilt your phone to run left or right, to let Mr. Tomato Man avoid falling balls. The objective of the game is to avoid the dodge balls for as long as possible, but be careful. Dodge balls can appear from any side of the screen.

This is the classic and exciting Bubble Shooter game which nice doodle UI. Knock the bubbles down by forming clusters of three or more bubbles. Your goal is to clear all the bubbles before they overflow the bottom line

This is the classic doodle style bubble match 3 game. It is free and now and you can shoot by touching the screen anywhere you need! If you can't distinguish the colors too well, you may switch to color blind mode.

Introducing Doodle Skater the next big doodle game to come out. Skateboard your way to the top. Features: Doodle style graphics Accelerometer movement to move skater Trick Shop to purchase upgrades Endless amounts of fun. Easy to play hard to master. Fun for all ages, Doodle Skater.
Tilt the phone to control the guy to jump down. The more your jump down, the higher score you got!

Double Flappy is an addictive game where you can play with your friends in COOPERATIVE mode or VERSUS mode! Also you can play the single player classic mode. Compete with your friends and people around the world. Features: - Play simultaneously with a friend on the same phone or tablet - Tap to flap your wings and fly the bird - Excellent graphics - Worldwide Leaderboards - Game modes: CLASSIC, COOPERATIVE, VERSUS WARNING! PLAY ALONE IN COOPERATIVE MODE CAN BE A FRUSTRATING EXPERIENCE! DON'T EVEN TRY IT

Smart Memory Booster - Android RAM Optimizer to speed up your devices as well as prevent battery drain! * Hot app in AppBrain * Recommended by AddictiveTips Smart Memory Booster reclaims lost memory for your programs by defragmenting your smartphone's memory as well as stop apps that runs on background and drain your battery. It is designed to tackle the difficult yet crucial problem of memory management for all Android devices. There are 5 ways to boost memory ☆ Auto smart boost - boost when device meets certain conditions, such as free memory amount, importance of an app, or how many memory that an app consumes ☆ Floating widget - Enable Memory Booster floating widget (on by default) to one tap boost anywhere ☆ Home screen widget - Add a widget from home screen ☆ Notification - one tap to boost (toggle notification boost bar visibility in app's setting) ☆ Boost Now button - tap this button from app's main screen There are many advanced options to tune boosting process: ☆ Boost level: select among 5 boost levels ☆ Ignored apps: apps will not be stopped when boosting ☆ Report style-define how to show reports ☆ Boost automatically: auto-boost, come with minimal Memory threshold and Boost interval ☆ Feedback - a haptic feedback when touch on boost widget ☆ Floating widget position/size/transparency - Change overlay widget position/size/opaque level ☆ Notification - Show memory info with report/auto refresh settings Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DroidMate

■ "World's Most Annoying Alarm App, featured by Cnet, Gizmodo,Huffington post etc." ■ #1 in the category in 80 countries, including Germany, France, and South Korea. (Appstore) ■ Features "Photo Mode" (Get out of bed and take a picture of registered place to turn off alarm) ■ Also support "Shake Mode" (To turn off alarm, shake your phone) and "Math problem mode" (To turn off alarm, solve the math problem) ■ No more late mornings for you ■ How to turn off the alarm ? (Picture dismiss mode) - Register a place where you want to turn off the alarm. - When alarm starts ringing, you will have to go to the registered place and take a picture. e.g.) If bathroom is the registered place, wake up and take a picture of the bathroom. ■ Tip - good place to register : bathroom sink, front door, shelf, desk, specific object, far from bed - bad place to register : brightness changes frequently, close to your bed, cealing, floor - If the currently registered alarm picture is too easy or too difficult to turn off, please register a new place :) Alarmy (Sleep If U Can) is the innovative solution for those who just can’t seem to get up on time, even with an alarm clock. This app has been cleverly designed to force you to get out of bed. You set it up by registering a photo of an area or room in your house. Then once the alarm is set, the ONLY way to make it stop ringing is to get out of bed and go take a photo of the registered area. The World’s Most Annoying Alarm Dubbed as “the world’s most annoying alarm”, Alarmy has quickly become a favorite mobile app among users. It has been featured in Gizmodo, Cnet, and at Huffington Post, and is currently Number One in its category in 70 countries, including France, Germany, and South Korea. Users are truly enjoying this app and many have devised their own unique methods around the alarm’s requirements. For instance, you could register the foot of the bed as your location, then you would only need to wake up enough to take a pic of the foot of your bed and then go right back to sleep. Of course, this totally circumvents the whole purpose of the app but has become a fun pastime for many users. Works Better Than Other Alarm Clocks Other creative locations that users have come up with include the ceiling of their room, a nightstand, or the floor. If you’re more serious about really getting up on time, then how about registering the bathroom sink or an item in the kitchen? Though the app has sparked lots of interest and has proven to be really entertaining, it will definitely get you out of bed. If you absolutely MUST get up on time for an important appointment or job interview, then this would be the perfect solution. e-mail : support@delightroom.org

TwinView is a wireless real time instrumentation and engine-data display and logging application for use with the Daytona Twin Tec family of Fuel Injector Controllers. TwinView facilitates initial tuning and diagnostics, especially on motorcycles without a tachometer. GPS speed display allows quick speedometer calibration. All logged data can be uploaded for further analysis. Requires Daytona Twin Tec's Bluetooth communications module. Simply pair your android device with the TwinTec module and enter the module's Bluetooth address into the appropriate field in TwinView's configuration settings.

description: This application will helps you tune your guitar using standard tuning EADGBE. You can use this to tune any type of guitar that has 6 strings such as an acoustic, electric, or even classical guitar. How to tune your guitar: Click on the audio file you need to tune that corresponds with the string you want to tune. To tune your low E string, play the “Low E string” audio file and then play the low E string on your guitar. As both are sounding, turn your low E string tuning peg on your guitar to match the pitch of the sound in the audio file.

description: Klient nutitelefonile http://www.peatus.ee kehtivate sõiduplaanide (bussiajad, rongiajad jne) mugavaks vaatamiseks. Mõeldud eelkõige kaardilt lähimate peatuste ning neid läbivate liinide ja väljumiste kiireks leidmiseks/sirvimiseks, aga võimaldab otsida peatusi ja liine ka nime järgi. Rakendus võimaldab vaadata kõigi Eesti-siseste liinide (bussiliinid, trolliliinid, trammiliinid, rongiliinid, praamiliinid, kaugliinid, maakonnaliinid, linnaliinid jne) sõiduplaane ning mõningate eranditega ka marsruute kaardil. Samuti on nime järgi otsides või kaardilt leitavad kõik peatused üle Eesti ning neid läbivad liinid(suunad). Rakendust on võimalik kasutada ka ilma GPS seadmeta (hetkel on vaikimisi asukoht Tallinn). Internetiühendus on vajalik, sest eesmärgiks oli teha rakendus, mis kasutaks alati ajakohaseid andmeid ning ei vajaks sõiduplaanide andmete uuendamiseks korduvat installeerimist. Hetkel on realiseeritud: - reaalajas Tallinna ühissõidukite asukohad kaardil - liinide ja peatuste otsimine nii kaardilt kui ka nime järgi - GPS/kaart, sh kasutajale lähimate liinide ja peatuste asukoht kaardil - peatust lähiajal läbivate liinide(suundade) nimekiri nii kaardi kui peatuste vaates. - liini ja peatuse sõiduplaan - salvestatud peatuste (lemmikud) nimekiri - Tallinna madalapõhjalised sõidukid Kui leiate sõiduplaanides vigu, siis esmalt kontrollige andmeid peatus.ee lehel. Kui peatus.ee lehel viga ei ole, siis siin umbmääraselt halamise asemel palun kirjutage nt e-kiri võimalikult täpse kirjeldusega (millisel kuval viga tekkis, kas viga on võimalik korrata, kas viga tekib alati või konkreetse liini/peatuse jne), siis on lootust, et see jõuab minuni ning mul õnnestub viga reprodutseerida. Ver 1.3.0 - Lisatud seadete kuva. Parandatud vigu. Ver 1.2.0 - Trolli- ja trammiliinid tähistatud erineva värviga (sinine, roheline). - Liinide otsimisel ei ole vaja sisestada sidekriipsu ("-"). Ver 1.1.0 - Liinide ja peatuste otsimisel võib täpitähtede asemel kasutada "oauo". - Liine on võimalik otsida ka numbri järgi. - Lisatud madalapõhjaliste sõidukite info (on näha väljumisaegade tabelites). - Lisatud võimalus peatuse salvestamisel lisada sellele endapoolne märkus (nt samanimeliste peatuste korral suuna info vms). Rakendus on realiseeritud vabast ajast enda lõbuks ning on isiklikuks kasutamiseks kõigile tasuta. Keegi ei vastuta võimalike rakenduse kasutamisest või mittekasutamisest tekkinud kahjude ja/või saamata jäänud tulu eest. Keegi ei garanteeri, et rakenduses ei esine vigu või see töötaks tõrgeteta (hetkel ja tulevikus). Client smartphone http://www.peatus.ee existing schedules (bus times, train times, etc.) for comfortable viewing. Designed especially for the map of the nearest bus stops and routes them through quickly find and departures to / browse through, however, allows you to search routes and stops by name. The application allows you to watch all of Estonia's domestic routes (bus lines, trolley lines, tram lines, train lines, ferry routes, remote lines, county lines, city lines, etc.), and with some exceptions, timetables and routes on a map. It is also the name of the map or by searching find out all the stops in Estonia and the lines passing through them (directions). The application can also be used without GPS devices (currently the default location of Tallinn). Internet access is required because the aim was to make an application that would use the data is always up to date, and would not need to update multiple scheduling installation. Who are realized: - Real-time location of vehicles in a joint map - Routes and stops on the card as well as searching by name - GPS / map, including bus stops and routes users to the closest location on the map - Stop in the near future through lines (axes), the list of stops if both the card view. - Path and stop timetables - Saved stops (favorites) list - In low floor vehicles If you find errors in timetables, first check the data sheet peatus.ee. If peatus.ee mistake not, then please write here instead of moaning vaguely, such as e-mail as an accurate description (which display the error occurred, the error can be repeated if the error occurs always or a specific line / stop, etc.), then there is hope it comes to me, and I manage to reproduce the error. Ver 1.3.0 - Added settings for the display. Corrected errors. Ver 1.2.0 - Trolleybus and tram lines marked with different colors (blue, green). - Lines searching for is no need to insert a hyphen ("-"). Ver 1.1.0 - Routes and stops searching accented characters may be used instead of "oauo". - Lines can also search by number. - Added a low vehicle-based information (departure time is shown in the tables). - Added option to stop recording to add to their side note (for example, the same name stops the directional information, etc.). The application is realized in their free time for fun and personal use free of charge. Someone is not liable for any use or non-use of the application, damages and / or loss of earnings. Someone does not guarantee that there are no errors or application to work properly (currently and in the future).

Chemical Pal (or ChemPal), the Chemical Resource, is an app designed to allow students and professionals to get information about chemical data in day-to-day chemistry and education. ** For anyone who wants to contribute to this project, please look for "Chemical Pal (Donate)" in our other apps. Your support is greatly appreciated! ** NOTE: The Internet access privilege is for collecting app data usage only, in order for us to find out what features you like best and what issues you may have with the application. We do NOT collect personal data and will NOT serve you advertisements! Please consider reviewing or commenting; reviews and comments help us decide what features to add next! If you want to see something, don't stay quiet; chances are, someone else wants it, too! The app provides four features. The first is a Periodic Table of the Elements, which is color-coded for different element types. You can tap each square to get basic info, or tap its full name to get the data sheet on it. The second is a mass calculator, that allows you to input any formula, such as "Al(SO4)3", and receive the relative atomic mass of such a compound. Additionally, typing in the name of a single element (such as "Hydrogen") will yield the mass of that element. ChemPal also provides an elementary Reaction Balancer, including electrons (and compound charges)! Finally, you can browse a list of all elements in the periodic table and view their name, elemental index, and weight. By tapping on one, you access our third feature, the elemental data sheet, which provides weight, density, boiling point, melting point, electron configurations, and more. Also provides a link to Wikipedia. If you are an international user and notice any errors in translations (my native language is English), please either write a review or email me--I'd like to eliminate these errors as soon as possible! To submit a bug: http://goo.gl/0BfvGy More features are on the way! Comments and reviews help us provide better updates in the future.

description: Бой бўлишни хоҳлайсизми? Агар сиз бой бўлишни хоҳласангиз, ушбу китобни албатта ўқинг! Биз олтмиш беш ёшга етганимизда туқсон фоиздан купимиз ё ҳеч вақога ярамайдиган ёхуд барбод бўлиб тугагандек кўринамиз. Саккиз фоиз эркаклар ва икки фоиз аёлларнигина молиявий жиҳатдан мустақил деб аташ мумкин бўлгани ҳолда фақат бир фоизгина аҳолини бой деса бўлади. Бунинг сабаби нимада? Ўша бир фоиз кишиларга бошқалар билмайдиган яна қандай нарсалар маълум? Улар бошқалардан кўра ақллироқми? Маълумоти тузукроқми? Кўпроқ меҳнат қиладиларми? Ёки улар тақдирнинг эркатойлари бўлган оддий бахтиёр инсонларми? Сизни ҳам бу саволлар ўйлантирадими? Агар сизга бу саволлар узоқ йиллардан бери тинчлик бермаётган бўлса, Адам Жексоннинг "Бой бўлмоқнинг ўнта сири" номли ҳаётингизни ўзгартириб юборадиган донишмандлик ва бойлик ҳақидаги замонавий зарбулмасални ўқинг. Адам Жексон: "Инсон заковати етган ва ишонган барча нарсага... эришиш мумкин", - деб таъкидлайди. Демак сиз муаллифнинг ушбу асарини ўқиб, бойликка эришишнинг ўнта тамойилини ҳаётингизда қўлласангиз, бойликнинг барча сир-синоатини очиб бериб, сизнинг ҳаётингизни буткул ўзгартириб юбориши мумкин. Хабарсиз қолманг! "Бой бўлмоқнинг ўнта сири" номли асарни эътиборсиз қолдирманг! 1. Биринчи сир: АНГЛАБ ЕТИЛМАГАН ЭЪТИҚОД КУЧИ 2. Иккинчи сир: ҲАММАДАН УСТУН КЕЛГАН ХОҲИШ КУЧИ 3. Учинчи сир: НИЯТНИНГ АНИҚЛИГИ ҚУВВАТИ Ушбу китоб 100% бепул приложенияни юклаб олинг афсус килмайсиз . Приложенияда реклама бор реклама блокларидан фойдаланинг фойдалансангиз бизни куллаб куватлаган буласиз олдиндан рахмат. Fight bўlishni hoҳlaysizmi?  Agar Seas battle bўlishni hoҳlasangiz, Ushba kitobni albatta ўқing!  Biz oltmish Besh eshga etganimizda tuқson foizdan kupimiz e ҳech vaқoga yaramaydigan Ehud barbod bўlib tugagandek kўrinamiz. Sakkiz foiz erkaklar Islands Ikki foiz aellarnigina moliyavy zhiҳatdan mustaқil Deb Atash mumkin bўlgani ҳolda faқat bir foizgina aҳolini fight Desa bўladi. Buning sababi nimada? All this knowledge is organized on nice easy to read lessons. Try and download now fro free - nothing to lose, but a whole lot of money to gain ;)

description: A spectacular 3D live wallpaper and daydream, featuring the moving gears of a stone clock tower! Light streams through the stained glass, illuminating the machinery! Features a fully 3D scene that works in both portrait and landscape orientation! Works as a daydream on 4.2+ devices! Select from different designs of glass and hands, modify the intensity of the light rays, camera speed, and more! Fully supports lighting shifting based on time of day! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Live Wallpapers PERMISSIONS: Coarse Location allows calculation of proper sunrise/sunset times
release_text: v1.2: - Bats! And a pref to turn them off...

description: Celebrate the season with jack-o-lanterns, bats, witches, a haunted house, ghosts, and more! Supports both landscape and portrait mode, with settings for bat population, candle color, witches, spiders, camera speed, and others! This is a true 3D scene that supports both phones and tablets, in both portrait and landscape mode! Works beautifully as a Daydream on 4.2+ devices! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Live Wallpapers
release_text: v1.62: * Fixed tree shader on some devices * Ghosts render more cleanly * More triangles on jack-o-lanterns

description: A beautiful live wallpaper featuring a tropical waterfall surrounded by jungle ruins! Not a movie, supports home screen switching and correctly supports both landscape and portrait mode. Settings available for for fog density and color, camera speed, time of day, waterfall speed, and more! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Live Wallpapers
release_text: v2.0: - Simulated scrolling on some devices - Adjust time of day colors - Now using OpenGL 2.0 v1.15: - New Feature: Adjust waterfall speed - Misc small fixes

description: Something electric for the Nikola Tesla in all of us! This mesmerizing live wallpaper features colorful plasma lines that gently dance around a beautiful reflective glass globe. Put the power of lightning at your fingertips and watch as the plasma follows your every touch! Our plasma ball crackles to life with real-time OpenGL 3D graphics that are never the same twice. It is not a movie or a slide show! Plus, it works as a Daydream on 4.2+ devices! This full version allows full ten-point multitouch, and features an extensive settings screen. You can customize the plasma color, how many lines there are, and how they responds (or not) to your touch. Choose from several beautiful backgrounds, or create your own, all reflected in real-time by the globe. Want to change the size of the globe, or how fast the camera moves around it? You can do that, too!
release_text: v1.0 - Initial release, please e-mail any issues!

description: A spectacular 3D scene of fire and lava! Watch a distant volcano erupt with streams of lava, with a dramatic volcanic landscape in the foreground. Double-tap to summon fireballs and magma boulders! Fully supports both tablets and phones in any orientation, and supports lighting changes based on the current time of day! TO USE: Home screen-> long press-> live wallpapers

Nutrition diary provides: - track calories, protein, fat, carbs, fiber, sodium, etc. - food descriptions, nutrients, weights and measures data - time of day you ate the food - statistics of daily summary/average nutrition weight - average statistics of DRI percent - chart statistics - DRI by your life stage - calendar of your calories, prot, fat, carbs You can search by: - food item, - keyword search, - group, - or list to find the nutrient information for your food items. Contains data on 7,906 food items and up to 146 food components. Dietary Reference Intakes (DRIs): Recommended Dietary Allowances and Adequate Intakes, Vitamins, Elements, Total Water and Macronutrients... DRI for infants, children, men, women, pregnant women, lactating women. Based on the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA), Release 24 (SR24). The USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference (SR) is the major source of food composition data in the United States. Free and fully functional application. No internet connection needed.

description: ¡SOLO TEMAZOS ahora es MegaStarFM! Esta es la versión 1.2, en la que hemos corregido algunos de los errores que habéis reportado, consiguiendo que la app de MegaStarFM sea más estable y compatible con más dispositivos Android. ¡Muchas gracias por tu ayuda! Y esta es la lista de novedades que hemos introducido en esta nueva versión: - Letras: podrás ver la letra de cada canción que suene. - Mover app a la tarjeta: si tenías problemas de espacio, podrás mover la aplicación a tu tarjeta SD. - Corrección de algunos errores y mejora en la estabilidad de la app. - Algunos cambios visuales. Now TEMAZOS MegaStarFM ONLY! This is version 1.2, which we have corrected some of the errors you have reported, making the MegaStarFM app more stable and supports more Android devices. Many thanks for your help! And this is the list of new features that we have introduced in this new version: - Lyrics: You can see the lyrics of each song to sound. - Move app to the card: if you had space problems, you can move the app to your SD card. - Fixed some bugs and improved stability of the app. - Some visual changes.

Corregido un problema que provocaba una salida forzada de la aplicación cuando se recibían llamadas o mensajes. Mejoras en la estabilidad.

description: Géolocalisez les collectes de sang, notez-les dans votre agenda, partagez l'info avec vos amis, calculez votre aptitude au don et votre date d'éligibilité pour le prochain don, et amusez-vous avec un quizz. Parce qu'un don du sang ne dure qu'une heure et permet de sauver des vies, nous proposons une application qui permet de savoir où donner son sang à proximité du lieu où l'on se trouve. En plus de la géolocalisation des collectes et les heures d'ouverture, des informations pratiques et fonctionnalités exclusives sont réunies en une seule application. ♥ trouver la collecte de sang la plus proche, en site fixe ou camion mobile ♥ auto-évaluer son aptitude au don par un court questionnaire ♥ connaître sa date d'éligibilité pour un prochain don ♥ s'amuser avec un quizz de culture générale sur le don du sang ♥ s'impliquer auprès d'une amicale de donneurs de sang près de chez soi ♥ et d'autres fonctionnalités à venir selon vos suggestions L'application est éditée par une association de donneurs de sang bénévoles. Elle est entièrement gratuite, il s'agit d'une initiative indépendante de l'EFS (Etablissement Français du Sang), portée par notre association exclusivement composée de bénévoles et donneurs de sang. Application développée par un groupe d'étudiants de l'EPITA (école d'ingénierie informatique), 100% made in France ! Pinpoint blood collections, write them on your calendar, share with friends, calculate your ability to donate and your date of eligibility for the next gift, and have fun with a quiz. Because a blood donation only takes an hour and saves lives, we propose an application that lets you know where to donate blood near the place where you are. In addition to geolocation collections and opening hours, practical information and exclusive features are combined into a single application. ♥ find the nearest blood collection in fixed site or mobile truck ♥ self-assess their ability to donate a short questionnaire ♥ know his date of eligibility for an upcoming gift ♥ fun with a general knowledge quiz on blood donation ♥ engage with a friendly blood donors close to home ♥ and other upcoming features according to your suggestions The application is published by an association of volunteer blood donors. It is completely free, it is an independent initiative of the EFS (French Blood Establishment), driven by our association composed exclusively of volunteers and blood donors. Application developed by a group of students EPITA (School of Computer Engineering), 100% made in France!

release_text: New features: -Add game statistics -Add options menu -Some bugs removed

description: Find a recipe has never been easier! RecetteTek is a real cookbook 2.0 for all food lovers. The application allows you to create your recipe library and manage them easily. You can gather all your favorite recipes in one application. Add your own recipes or import them directly from the Internet . RecetteTek has a search engine to easily find and import recipes from most cooking WebSites. Your recipe is not provided for the right quantity? Change it easily! Thanks to the different filters available (categories, ingredients, tags, favorites) , you will find recipes as quickly as a flash. Bring with you your shopping lists in order to not forget anything at the supermarket. Create as many shopping lists as you want. From the recipe , add the ingredients directly into the list of your choice. You can use your tablet in order to not to have to touch the screen when you are cooking. You can not make your decision in all your recipes? Shake your device, RecetteTek will choose a recipe for you. RecetteTek will make you forget your pieces of paper ! Cooking will be a pleasure . The application is free and without limitations :-) Features : * Search engine of recipes integrated into the application * Add recipe, modify the ingredients , steps and photos, rate your recipes * Sort and filter your recipes by category * Search by ingredients , convenient to finish the leftovers from his fridge! * Add favorite recipes * Manage your own categories * Share your recipes by mail * Backup and restore your recipes (You can also share your recipes with your friends! ) * Create your shopping lists from recipe details * Change the quantities (automatic calculate) * Search by tags * Plan your recipes week by week * Remove ads (paid option) How to import a recipe? > By using the integrated search engine > Since your browser sharing the page to the application RecetteTek > Entering the url address of the recipe in the import function of the application You can use your computer, the recipes generator (.rtk) available on our website to quickly import your recipes http://www.cmonapp.fr/recettetek/generator.html?lang=en Come follow the news of the application : Twitter: https://twitter.com/recettetek Google+ : https://plus.google.com/110488147708189193743 Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/recettetek
release_text: V 4.5.3.3 - Bug fixes - Ability to change storage image location - Polish translation. Thank balou - Fix restoration error V 4.5.2 - New feature "History" : switch easily between your recipes - Fix Wiko bug V 4.4.2 - PDF share V 4.4.1 - New Video field, YouTube is now supported by the app - Remove Ads from the application (paid option) - Bugs fixes Thank you for all your comments :-)

app_name: 메신저 대화 수정 (라인 채팅 썰 만들기)
description: * 이앱은 실제 대화를 하는게 아닌 가상 대화를 만드는 앱입니다. 재미난 대화를 만들어 친구에게 자랑하고 공유해보세요. 연예인과 채팅 또는 좋아하는 사람에게 고백하는 상상 채팅등. 모든것을 만들수 있습니다. 재미있는 대화 만들어 친구와 공유해보세요. 다양한 재미는 여러분의 창의력에 달려있습니다!! - 사용방법 1. 내 프로필을 만드세요. 2. 대화하고자하는 상대방 목록을 만드세요. 이 목록으로 자유롭게 초대및 대화할 수 있습니다. 프로필 사진도 올릴 수 있습니다. (다른 친구를 내 프로필로 만들 수도 있습니다.) 3. 대화하고자 하는 친구를 누르세요. 4. 만약 내 프로필이 없으면 임시로 '나'라는 유저가 대화를 합니다. 5. 채팅창에서 상대방 또는 나를 선택하여 실시간으로 대화를 만드세요. 있습니다. 7. 대화를 삭제하거나 시간을 수정하고 싶으면 말풍선을 터치하세요. 8. 대화를 다 만들었으면 기기의 메뉴버튼(또는 오른쪽 상단에 메뉴 버튼)을 눌러 캡쳐용으로 변경 후 +버튼을 눌러 캡쳐! 9. 캡쳐된 이미지를 자유롭게 카카오스토리, 트위터등에 공유해보세요~ * 캡쳐용으로 전환 후 + 버튼을 누르면 캡쳐가 됩니다. (갤러리 저장) * 상단에 상태바까지 캡쳐를 원하시면 기기 자체의 캡쳐 기능을 사용하세요. (삼성폰: 홈+전원버튼, 그외: 볼륨아래+홈버튼 을 3초 정도 누르고 계세요.) * 새로운 기능은 계속 추가 예정입니다. * 앞으로 다양한 메신저 테마가 추가될것입니다. * 필요한 기능이나 아이디어는 언제든지 댓글이나 이메일을 보내주세요! ( iamkorean@gmail.com ) - 기능 * 테마 변경 가능 (기본, 라인 수정 테마 지원중) * 마음대로 친구를 추가 가능 (연예인도 이젠 내 카톡 친구!) * 대화 목록 저장 가능 (매일 매일 대화 하세요.) * 캡쳐 기능 (캡쳐용으로 전환 후 + 버튼) * 1:1대화및 단체채팅 가능. * 초대하기, 내보내기 기능 * 기타 등등등. - 앞으로 추가할 기능 * 사진 보내기 * 대화명 수정 * 대화방 배경 변경 * 다양한 채팅 내용 보내기 (게임, 동영상, 음성 등등) ** 불법적이거나 악의적으로 사용을 하지 마시기 바랍니다. ** *** 수정 앱 사용으로 인해 일어난 일은 전적으로 유저에게 책임이 있습니다. **** 메신저 대화 수정은 실제 대화가 아니라 대화를 직접 만드는 가짜톡, 패러디 앱니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : iamkorean@gmail.com 서울시 강남구 선릉로 551 새롬빌딩 2층 * Yiaep's conversation, not the actual app is to create a virtual conversation. Make interesting conversation proud to share it with a friend. For people who like to chat with celebrities confess to imagine or chat. You can make everything. Make interesting conversation and share it with your friends. A variety of fun depends on your creativity! - How to use 1 to personalize your profile. 2 dialog wish to personalize the party list. Chemistry Flashcards is the ultimate way for chemistry students to study and memorize the names and structures of all the important chemical nomenclature from a general chemistry course. Quiz yourself, and do it in a way that's fun and logically organized. Don't waste time with other apps that provide a clutter of unnecessary information you don't need to know. General Chemistry Nomenclature let's you choose the quizzes important to your class and focus your efforts to quickly and efficiently study. Quizzes are divided into the following categories - Monoatomic Anions - Polyatomic Anions - Cations - Cations with Multiple Oxidation States - Acids You can choose to be quizzed on any combination of these categories at once. *** Smart Quiz System ensures you will never be asked the same question twice in a row and questions you answer correctly will be asked less often. Truly the best way to learn important chemical nomenclature. *** Created By: Alex Martinko (Design) Sean Luther (Programming)

Emoticonos y memes divertidos es una aplicación en la que básicamente se agrupan muchos emoticonos, iconos de animales, memes, imágenes divertidas y otros que puedes compartir por ejemplo por whatsapp o a través de programas que permitan la inclusión de imágenes por medios externos (telegram, line, gmail...). La aplicación de emoticonos está dividida en varias secciones o categorías. Empezando por la categoría de emoticonos, te encontrarás más de cien emoticonos para que puedas compartir a través de whatsapp. Hay emoticonos de frio, de risa, caras divertidas, iconos de ninjas, de fiesta, de camuflaje, emoticonos de demonios, de ángeles, de gente enfadada y muchos muchos más. Siguiendo por la categoría de animales, hay emoticonos de patos, elefantes, zorros, pingüinos, pájaros, abejas, gallinas, osos pandas y un mogollón más de animales con los que amenizar tus conversaciones de whatsapp o de line o telegram. Después tenemos la categoría de memes, que contiene los memes más usados y divertidos como "troll dad", "forever alone", "me gusta", "LOL", "it's something" y un largo etc. Si tenías fiebre por los memes ahora ya los puedes enviar por whatsapp. Y para las épocas navideñas. La app tiene un largo y extenso abanico de emoticonos con motivos navideños como por ejemplo bolas de navidad, gorros de papa noel, muñecos de nieve, iconos de papa noel, renos, estrellas, imágenes de árboles de navidad, palos de caramelo, campanas de navidad y algún que otro emoticono más. Por último tenemos la sección de imágenes divertidas, que como su propio nombre indica contiene un compendio de imágenes divertidas o con frases graciosas que puedes compartir y enviar por whatsapp. Y si te parecen pocos emoticonos, no te preocupes, ya que iremos lanzando actualizaciones con los comentarios que vayamos recibiendo pidiendo nuevos emoticonos, iconos o imágenes. Emoticons and funny memes is an application that basically many emoticons, animal icons, memes, funny pictures and others can share for example whatsapp or through programs that allow the inclusion of images by external means (telegram, grouped line , gmail ...). The application of smileys is divided into several sections or categories. You starting emoticons category, you will find over a hundred emoticons so that you can share via whatsapp. There emoticons cold, laughter, funny faces, icons ninjas, party, camouflage, emoticons demons, angels, angry people and many many more. Continuing on the animal category, there are emoticons ducks, elephants, foxes, penguins, birds, bees, chickens, pandas and a ton more than animals that enliven your conversations whatsapp or line or telegram. Then we have the category of memes, which contains the most used and funny as "troll dad", "forever alone", "like", "LOL", "it's something" and etc memes. If memes had fever and can now send whatsapp. And for the Christmas season. The app has a long and extensive range of emoticons with Christmas such as Christmas balls, caps santa, snowmen, santa icons, reindeer, stars, images of Christmas trees, candy canes, bells Christmas and the occasional emoticon more. Finally we have the funny pictures section, which as the name suggests contains a compendium of fun or funny quotes that you can share and send whatsapp images. And if you look a few emoticons, do not worry, as we will be releasing updates with the comments that we receive asking new emoticons, icons or images.

Pulseras de gomitas es la aplicación definitiva para crear tus pulseras. Te enseñamos como hacer flores, figuras y demás manualidades con gomas elásticas o gomitas. Además podrás crear tus pulseritas sin necesidad del telar rainbow loom o crazy loom, o si lo tienes también tenemos creaciones y manualidades con gomitas para telares. Es una aplicación de tutoriales DIY (do it yourself). Desgranando un poco más el funcionamiento de la aplicación de pulseras de gomitas. En primer lugar te encontrarás con dos opciones, la primera de ellas es para acceder a las manualidades con gomitas sin la necesidad de utilizar telar; y en la segunda opción podrás ver todas las creaciones disponibles para hacer con telar (mayormente con el telar rainbow loom). Una vez dentro podrás elegir entre varias categorías y su contenido, entre ellas: - Animales: podrás hacer ositos pandas, pulpos, serpientes, tortugas... - Figuras: encontrarás como hacer pelotas, flores con gomitas, corazón, símbolos, lápiz... - Frutas: podrás ver como hacer cerezas, piña, fresa, manzana y mucho más con gomas. - Letras: como hacer el abecedario completo con gomas. - Personajes: aprender a crear personajes famosos de tus series de dibujos. - Pulseras y joyas: encontrarás pulseras fishtail, pulsera de escamas de dragón pulsera triple, pulsera taffy twist, pulsera triple fishtail, pulsera de explosión de estrellas, anillos, pendientes... - Varios: cestas, adaptador, mostacho, huella. La aplicación "Resultados Mundial Brasil 2014" es la app definitiva para ver los resultados de futbol del mundial 2014 que se juega en Brasil. Estarás informado minuto a minuto de como va tu selección o si los equipos rivales se acercan. Es una aplicación muy sencilla y muy fácil de utilizar, pero con la información suficiente y necesaria para estar al día de los resultados del mundial. Hay tres acciones básicas que puedes realizar, la primera corresponde al botón de la pantalla de principal "por equipo" que te mostrará una lista de equipos clasificados en el mundial 2014 para obtener los partidos y resultados correspondientes a ese equipo. Así, por ejemplo podrás ver el calendario de los próximos partidos para España o Brasil en el mundial de futbol. Otra opción que puedes utilizar es la de ver los partidos de la fase de grupos; si entras en esta sección se te mostrarán todos los partidos y resultados del mundial diferenciados por grupos. Y por último podrás consultar los partidos de la eliminatoria y de la fase final organizados por octavos, cuartos, seminifinales y final. Aplicación sencilla donde las haya pero muy útil ya que te indicará en todo momento el marcador del equipo local, el del equipo visitante con sus correspondientes escudos, el minuto de juego en el que se encuentra el partido y la fecha y hora exacta a la que dará comienzo el partido del mundial de futbol. No te perderás ni un sólo resultado de tu equipo. Para mejorar la sensación visual del usuario a la hora de ver los resultados del mundial 2014 se han utilizado diferentes elementos gráficos de la web freepik.es y otras imágenes con licencia gratuita. The "World Brasil 2014 Results" is the ultimate app to see the results of the 2014 World Cup soccer to be played in Brazil. You will be informed the minute how will your selection or if opposing teams are close. It is a very simple and very easy to use, but with sufficient and necessary to keep abreast of the results of global information application. There are three basic actions you can perform, the first is the button on the main screen "team" that will show you a list of teams in the 2014 world for matches and results for that team. For example you will see the schedule of upcoming games for Spain or Brazil in the World Cup. Another option you can use is to watch the matches of the group stage; if you enter this section will show all the matches and results of world-differentiated groups. And finally you can see the qualifying matches and the finals organized by eighths, quarters, seminifinales and final. You will not miss even one result of your team. To improve the visual user feel when you see the results of the 2014 world have used different graphic elements of web freepik.es and other images with free license.

En todo momento sabrás el tiempo que te lleva realizar el test y cuando lleves 30 preguntas realizadas te aparecerán las preguntas que fallaste y su respuesta correcta para que las tengas en cuenta en futuros test. If you're thinking about getting your driver's license and you have to face the theoretical examination not hesitate to try test driving.

Get the best Mancala game for free. Test your skills against a friend or try our 128 levels where you will meet powerful opponents. Mancala is a very old game that was played in Africa in countries like Syria, Lebanon or Egypt. This game was mentioned first in 6th and 7th century AD and all that players needed was some seeds and a wooden Mancala board. Although it is an ancient game it required intelligence, attention and vision. This board game is also known in different countries or regions with other names like: Woro, Awele (Awale), Oware (Owari), Kboo, Kbo, Ayo, Ayoayo, Kale, Aghi, Bantumi. In America you could find it under the name of Mandink and in Kenya or other countries from Africa as Endoidoi. But by far the most common other names are Kalah and Oware (Owari). And also maybe Awele (Awale) or Ayo and even Wari. All this are names from Africa so the origin of this game must be Africa. It was brought in USA under the name of Kalah and a commercial version became popular in the 1940s. in the West Africa and the Caribbean you could find the name Oware (Owari). Both Kalah and Oware (Owari) represent this board game but maybe with some changes. It is said that Kalah or Oware (Owari) are not a Mancala game but are part of the Mancala familiy board games. Your objective is simple: get more gems ( gold ) than your opponent. So if you collect more gems ( gold ) in your mancala at the end of the game you are the winner. But sometimes is not that simple. There are some rules and strategy that can help you or destroy you. Each player have 6 cups (or different number of cups). Initially each of the cups has the same number of pieces of gold (there is the option where you can have a variable number of pieces of gold) and the opponents will take turns. On each turn you must select one of your cups that contain gems in it and redistribute it's gems clockwise to the next cups. If the last gem that you redistribute lands on your mancala you receive another turn. If the last gem that you redistribute lands on an empty cup from your side you "steal" all the gems from your opponent side. The game ends when you or your opponent have/has no pieces of gold in the cups from your or his side. You can play this board game agains a friend or against the computer. You can change the number of gems in each cup (2,3,4 or 5 or variable), the number of places for gems available in the cups and 4 type of difficulty for the computer. Some graphical changes are also posible like the colors of the gems. You also can play in a time limited per round and also change the first one to start (you or the computer). Don't forget to play the quest of this board game. 4 seasons available with 32 levels each. The computer will became stronger as you manage to move forward. He will play more aggressive or more defensive. The number of pieces of gold will change and other interesting things that will make this quest very nice. The second season is time limited so for each turn you will have a limit amount of time to do your move. If you don't make the move you will lose your turn. It gets really complicated at the end when you will only have 3 seconds for your turn. The third season is with a variable number of gems in each cup so the clasic strategy and moves could not be used here. The fourth season is where everything is changed. The numbers of cups, the number of cups holders or gems. This is the most difficult season. Please send feedbacks for improvements and bug fixing to improve this board game. This game is playable on all resolutions and we recommende it on any devices. Have fun!

description: This is a DEMO version which has a LIMIT of 4 decks and 6 cards per deck. The paid version does not have this restriction. Flashcards Deluxe is an easy to use yet powerful and full-featured flashcard app which you can use to study just about anything you want. Features: • Two smart study modes that automatically focus more on the cards you miss: Leitner and a more advanced Spaced Repetition mode (similar to SuperMemo or Anki) • Quizlet.com integration - Browse and download any of their 4 million+ flashcard sets. • Text to speech (TTS) audio in 18 languages (no internet connection needed to study) • Multiple choice option • Spelling tests (listen to audio and use keyboard to answer) • Searchable listing of your cards that allows you to easily look up other terms as you study • Organize decks in folders and combine decks for studying • Several flashcard color themes to choose from (sky, wood, chalkboard, etc.) • Divide cards into categories • 1 to 5 sided cards • Include pictures and sounds. Zoom into pictures. Auto repeat sounds. • 3 response levels: Wrong, I kind of know, I know really well (vs the standard correct/wrong) - for more efficient studying • Easy navigation - swipe or tap to answer (customizable) • Draw self-graded answer with your finger (drawing not saved) • Automatically turn cards off after getting them correct a certain number/percentage of reviews • Clean, efficient user interface, including full-screen and landscape viewing • Custom text and background colors • Browse mode that lets you easily navigate forward or back without keeping score • Slideshow mode • Large number of cards (10,000+) can be imported easily (full version) • Backup your flashcards to your computer • Dropbox and Google Drive support • Very easy to get started, with lots of features and options for advanced users • Great support! I promptly respond to any questions or feedback you may have. Use my website's public forum or email me. You can create flashcards either on your computer or directly within the app. If you don't want to make your own, you can browse and download flashcards from Quizlet.com. Please see our website at OrangeOrApple.com for more information. If you are not satisfied with the product for any reason, please let me know why and I'll try to help.
release_text: • Customize buttons at bottom of study screen. Add 1-tap Flag and Exclude buttons. (Global Options > Control > Study Buttons) • Install text and Excel files through email. Export Excel files through email. • Spelling - option to show number of characters in the answer as a hint.

description: Support, tip and tricks: http://www.orangepixel.net/forum/ Subscribe to our newsletter for new and exclusive content: http://orangepixel.net/subscribe ------------------- Survive the invasion of the supernatural, the robots, the monsters.. the world needs you! http://www.groundskeepergame.com ----- ★TouchArcade 4/5 – “Groundskeeper2 is an entertaining action game that will keep you busy blasting bots for bits and bobs for a while” ★Paranerds 9/10 - "It's fast-paced, easy to play and addicting, all the while being charming, funny and filled with fantastic music and art" ★Android Rundown 8/10 - "This is just another well-done 2D action game from Orangepixel, and well worth checking out." ★148Apps 4/5 - “Groundskeeper2 is a fun and furious action/shooting game that keeps players coming back.” ★PocketGamer - Bronze award - "A big old bundle of laser blasting fun, Groundskeeper 2 does what it does with style and a cheeky smile" ---- Groundskeeper2 throws you in the middle of a war, the war with supernatural robots from outer space.. yeah.. we went there! Every time you play this game you will get further and have a better chance at surviving. You'll unlock new weapons like the machine-gun, laser-gun, rocket-launcher, and tools like all-destroying lightbeams, shields, time-slowdowns, and more! What's more important, you'll unlock new worlds and hopefully become a true hero for the resistance... or you die a quick death and try again.. Features: - unlockables, a LOT of unlockables - fast paced arcade action - unlockable weapons - always changing gameplay (levels are randomized) - unlockable worlds - big bad ass robots - achievements, leaderboards - and did we mention a lot of unlockables? ** BUGS if you run into problems or the game wont work on your device, instead of just rating 1 star, you could help us fix it by providing feedback! Do your kids love Christmas? Do they love Santa Claus, cute reindeer, a frosty snowman, and puzzles too? Look no further. Christmas Games for Kids: Cool Santa Claus, Snowman, and Reindeer Jigsaw Puzzles for Toddlers, Boys, and Girls HD is a fun animated puzzle game for toddlers, preschoolers, and kids from ages 2 to 6. The app includes twelve different child and toddler friendly, jigsaw-style puzzles with options to change the number of pieces and remove other helpers. The puzzles start off easy to play and get more challenging- perfect for the little one in your life who loves the best things Christmas: frosty snow, a cool snowman, Santa Claus, cute reindeer, and puzzles! The Christmas themed scenes include a fun frosty snowman waving, Santa Claus with his cherry red nose flying through the air with his reindeer, cute penguins playing, Christmas Trees with presents, and much more! Every scene will light up your child's imagination as they take part in this amazing fantasy world! Santa Claus, Snowman, and Reindeer Jigsaw Puzzles for Toddlers, Boys, and Girls HD features virtual jigsaw pieces for learning shape recognition and matching- great for educational purposes or just for fun! Good for one of your child's first puzzle games- it's easy for beginners to connect with and get lost in this magical children's fantasy world. Features: * Fun, creative graphics by illustrator Jenny Tiffany. * 12 different fun Christmas puzzles to choose from! * Positive encouragement. * Fun interactive stars and bubbles to pop! * Choose your own difficulty! Increase the number of pieces from 9 up to 24 as your child's fine motor and spatial skills improve! * Easy for kids to use and control.
release_text: 1.03 * Fixed information in the parents section

description: Kids can now easily make their own puzzles from photos with Puzzle Maker for Kids: Create Your Own Jigsaw Puzzles from Pictures! Do your kids love taking pictures? Do they love puzzles too? Look no further. Puzzle Maker for Kids: Create Your Own Jigsaw Puzzles is a fun puzzle game for toddlers, preschoolers, and kids from ages 1 to 6. Your child can now easily make a puzzle out of anything they want! They simply tap a puzzle and take a picture. Anything that they love such as toys, cars, animals, trucks, bugs, dinosaurs, and even you can become a puzzle. The app allows for twenty different child and toddler friendly, jigsaw-style puzzles with options to change the number of pieces and remove other helpers. The puzzles start off easy to play and get more challenging as they change the settings- perfect for the little one in your life who loves puzzles! Features: * Fun, creative graphics by illustrator Jenny Tiffany. * 20 different puzzles to create! * Positive encouragement. * Fun interactive stars or bubbles to pop at the end of each puzzle! * Choose your own difficulty! Increase the number of pieces from 9 up to 24 as your child's fine motor and spatial skills improve! * Easy for kids to use and control.

description: If you have a preschooler just starting to learn shapes and colors, this is the perfect app for you! 12 clever and colorful puzzles will delight, entertain and educate your young boys and girls as they learn to identify basic shapes and colors. Circles, rectangles, octagons, triangles and stars- this app has it all! Whimsical drawings transform these basic learning concepts into fun characters that come to life when a puzzle is completed. See a square businessman do a little dance with his square puppy, check out aliens hovering in their hexagonal spaceships and an oval fish and a rectangular whale under the sea! Garden bugs and snails crawl around while a trio of stars dance and fly through the sky, and series of circular cats bounce and twirl, and a trio of square, circle and triangular friends wave to say hello. If your child is in preschool or kindergarten they will love this fun educational game! Kids will love these puzzles for the bright colors, funny characters and appealing animation, parents will love the app for its safe, kid-friendly environment. Features: * Rich, colorful graphics by children's book illustrator Laura Tallardy. * 12 different cute shape puzzles to choose from! * Positive encouragement. * Fun shapes to pop at the end of each puzzle! * Increasing difficulty. * Easy for kids to use and control. For more information on our privacy policy, please visit: http://scottadelman.com/privacy-policy/
release_text: New App Release by Scott Adelman Apps Inc and Laura Tallardy!

description: Map viewer, track logger. You can use OruxMaps for your outdoor activities (running, treking, mountain bike, paragliding, flying, nautic sports,....) 100% free 100% no adversisements Online and offline maps. Support to multiple formats: -OruxMaps format. You can use maps from Ozi Explorer transformed wit a PC tool. -.ozf2 -.img garmin (vectorial) -no full support is provided-. -.mbtiles -.rmap -.map (vectorial from mapsforge). Support to custom themes similat than Locus themes. Support to Wms, you can use the application as a WMS viewer. 3D view. Support to multiple external devices: -GPS bluetooth. -Heart rate monitors, bluetooth Zephyr, Polar (including bluettoh smart devices, like polar H7). -ANT+ (speed, cadence, heart rate, distance,...). -AIS information systems (experimental), for nautical sports, using Wifi o BT. More features: Support to KML KMZ and GPX formats. Share your position with your friends, display the position of your friends in your device. Download online maps for offline use. Text to speech support. Profiles; save your preferences in your SD card. Statistics with graphics. Follow routes, with different alarms to alert you if you are near a waypoint, or you are far from the route. Create/save wayponits, attaching photo/audio/video extensions. Custom waypoints types, with your icons. Basic support to Geocaching. Correct the altitude of your tracks/routes using DEM files (offline) or online services. Search/download tracks from: -everytrail.com -gpsies.com Search or create tracks using online services from Cloudmade or offline using Broute app. Upload tracks to: -mapmytracks.com -trainingstagebuch.org -ikimap -wikirutas -openxplora Live tracking using: -mapmytracks.com -okmap application -gpsgate protocol More info here: www.oruxmaps.com

description: Easy Task is an app launcher. This application lets you quickly change application performing a movement of the thumb from right to left. *** It does NOT work in Lollipop ( android 5.0 +) because Google API change *** In the top right you see a red area that you can adjust in height, width and position. You drag and keep your finger on the screen. As you moving the finger, appear to 3 waves of recent applications. To run one of them, just lift your finger on it. You see the name and icon at the top of the screen. Besides can also kill an application if it is running. If the icon has a green circle in the upper left side, you have to maintain for a selected time such app for that. You will see the message changes and indication bar appears. Tips - If you at some point, the zone bothers you, you just have to hold it down without going to the left to disappear for several seconds. - The option Keep recent set of applications deployed in the waves until you decide to release them. - You can configure many more options by pressing the Settings button. - You can access this screen from the notification bar. - Only works in portrait mode.

This is a classic trivia game with general questions. This version has 110 questions and 11 levels. You have 15 seconds to pass every question. Every 5 seconds one of the answers will dissapear, till only two of them. In order to pass every level you must do it in less than 85 seconds, in other case you will have to repeat it. Your level time will be registered at the records table. You must select this option on the menu. You can always reset the game in order to start again. *** If you find any bug, please mail to pacosal@gmail, thanks! Spanish version too with different questions.

** The most exciting FPS game - Gun Strike ** new sequel debuts. Gun Strike 2 is a Third Person Shooter(TPS) that designed for fans of FPS, shooting games, action games. You will portray as an experience mercenary, equipped with all kinds of weapon to challenge various shooting assignments. There will be 27 different types of mercenary, 41 types of rifle, handgun, and grenade to choose from. Player can use their rewarded points and prizes to upgrade their own team and gears to compete with other worldwide players in Google Play Game Service for the Best Mercenary Title. [Game Characteristic] ** Reflect Real Weapon Characteristic ** -Let player experience the firing and explosive power of automatic weapon, handguns and grenade thru game simulation. -In the course of level up, player can enhance the weapons power, stability, and speed, as well as equip sniper scope and grenade launcher. -Prior to weapon purchase, player can test them in shooting range with moving targets, cans, and bottles. ** Various Shooting Assignments ** -A mixture of tactical assignments such as Base Defense, Enemy Territory Assault, Survival, Hunting, Hostage Rescue, Scientist escort, and Enemy Boss Challenge. -Actual game play are set in worldwide battlefields such as deserts, jungles, snow field, ocean ports, modern city, and in many different backgrounds and scene. ** Power Mercenary Roster ** -Player can choose from 27 types of mercenary. Each mercenary has different characteristic, outfit, strength and special skills. -Each charter has been specially designed, with different types of weapon, packing, and reloading action. Thru physics engine real time calculation, each character attack action, explosions, and movements are becoming more realistic and real life. ** Support Google Play Game Service ** -16 types of game achievements, 5 ranking chart, and worldwide player challenge capability. -Support Cloud Storage function. **Weapon Collection** -Assault Rifles M1 Garand, STG44, M14, AK-47, M16A1, M4A1, AUG, FN SCAR, HK416, FAMAS -Machine Guns M249, M60, M134 -Sniper Rifles SVD, Remington 700, AWP, HK G3SG, M82A1, CheyTac M200 -Grenade Launchers RG-6, M32 MGL -Hand Guns P38, M1911, Beretta M92F, Glock 18C , Five-seveN, Colt Anaconda, Desert Eagle -Submachine Guns Thompson, UZI, MP5 Navy, FN P90, HK MP7A1, KRISS Vector -Shotguns Remington 870, M4 Super 90, AA-12, Kel-Tec KSG -Grenades Mk2, M67, Flashbang Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PaladinGames Twitter: https://twitter.com/PaladinGame [TIPS] *. When the game play is not smooth, try to set the ‘Effect Level’ in GameOption to normal. [MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS] Android 2.3/ 320x480/ 1GHz CPU/ 512MB RAM [RECOMMENDED REQUIREMENTS] Android 4.0/ 480x800/ Dual-core 1GHz CPU/ 1GB RAM

“Panasonic Image App” is an application that makes it possible to use your smartphone to remotely control the shooting and playback functions of a Wi-Fi-compatible digital camera/digital video camera, and to perform upload operations to SNS (Social Networking Service) sites. The following major functions are available with this application. ・You can watch the same image as on the Live View screen of your digital camera/digital video camera on your smartphone, and control shooting and other camera operations as with a wireless remote controller. (*1) ・You can play back and delete still pictures and videos recorded using your digital camera/digital video camera on your smartphone. (*2) (*3) You can also copy them to your smartphone, and upload them to SNS sites. (*3) ・If your smartphone is equipped with NFC functions, you can perform the initial Wi-Fi settings and establish a connection simply by touching your digital camera/digital video camera with your smartphone. (*4) (*5) (*7) (*8) Additional functions for digital cameras ・If your smartphone is equipped with NFC functions, you can transfer recorded still pictures stored in your digital camera to your smartphone simply by touching your digital camera with your smartphone. (*4) ・You can make settings to automatically transfer still pictures recorded with your digital camera to your smartphone. ・You can add location information acquired with your smartphone to pictures recorded using your digital camera. Additional functions for digital video cameras ・By installing a digital video camera, you can monitor your home while you are out by checking the image on your smartphone, and speak to those at home and take pictures. (*3) (*6) (*7) ・You can play back recorded still pictures and videos from your digital video camera on a DLNA-compatible TV using a LAN connection. (*3) (*7) (*1) With DMC-SZ8 / SZ9 / SZ10 / TZ55 / TZ56 / TZ57 / TZ58 / ZS35 / ZS45, it is not possible to remotely record videos from a smartphone. (*2) With DMC-FT5 / GF6 / LF1 / SZ8 / SZ9 / SZ10 / TS5 / TZ37 / TZ40 / TZ41 / TZ55 / TZ56 / TZ57 / TZ58 / ZS27 / ZS30 / ZS35 / ZS45, it is only possible to play back still pictures. (*3) Not supported on HC-X1000. (*4) Not supported on DMC-TX1 / TZ100 / TZ110 / TZ101 / ZS100 / ZS110 / TZ85 / TZ80 / TZ81 / ZS60 / FZ300 / FZ330 / G7 / G70 / GF8 / GF7 / GM5 / GM1S / GM1 / SZ8 / SZ9 / SZ10 / TZ55 / TZ56 / TZ57 / TZ58 / ZS35 / ZS45. (*5) Not supported on HX-A100 / WA30. (*6) Not supported on HX-A100 / A500 / WA30. (*7) Not supported on HX-A1H/A1M. (*8) Not supported on HC-WXF990M / WXF991 / WXF990 / VXF990 / VXF999 / VX980M / VX980 / VX981 / VX989 / W580M / W580 / V380. [Compatible Operating Systems] 　　Android 4.0 - 6.0 [Notes] ・The NFC functions can only be used with a smartphone that is also equipped with NFC functions. ・Be aware that when using the location information recording function, continued use of the GPS function can lead to a dramatic decrease in battery capacity. ・In order to use the SNS upload functions or the Cloud Sync. Service, you must first obtain a service user ID for Panasonic’s LUMIX CLUB (free of charge). ・For information on using this app or compatible models, visit the following support page. http://panasonic.jp/support/global/cs/soft/image_app/ ・Please understand that we will not be able to contact you directly even if you use the “Email Developer” link.
release_text: [Newly added features in Panasonic Image App 1.9.10] New LUMIX digital camera models DMC-TX1 / TZ100 / TZ110 / TZ101 / ZS100 / ZS110 / TZ85 /TZ80 / TZ81 / ZS60 / GF8 are now supported. New digital video camera models HC-WXF990M / WXF991 / WXF990 / VXF990 / VXF999 / VX980M / VX980 / VX981 / VX989 / W580M / W580 / V380 are now supported.

「Wi-Fiカードリーダー」はパナソニック「Wi-Fi SDカードリーダー BN-SDWBP3」専用のアプリケーションです。本アプリを使って、スマートフォン内の写真／動画／アドレス帳データを「BN-SDWBP3」に装着したSDカードにバックアップすることができます。また、SDカード内のファイルをスマートフォンで閲覧、再生することができます。 対応OS Android 4.0～5.0 対応ファイル形式 静止画・・・jpg、png、bmp、gif 動画 ・・・mp4、m4v、3gp 音楽 ・・・mp3、m4a、wav 文書 ・・・pdf、doc/docx、xls/xlsx、ppt/pptx、txt、zip "Wi-Fi card reader" Panasonic "Wi-Fi SD card reader BN-SDWBP3" is a dedicated application. Using this app, you will be able to back up photos / videos / address book data in the smart phone to the SD card that was attached to the "BN-SDWBP3". Also, browse the files in the SD card in the smart phone, you will be able to play. Supported OS   Android 4.0 ~ 5.0 Supported file formats   Still image ··· jpg, png, bmp, gif   Video ··· mp4, m4v, 3gp   Music ··· mp3, m4a, wav   Document ··· pdf, doc / docx, xls / xlsx, ppt / pptx, txt, zip
