description: Service thats runs at boot that allows you to set volumes for 3 different profiles: headset, headphones & phone. This way you do not have to adjust the volume each time you plug in/out your gear. Start service after installing. Headsetter was tested on the HTC N1. If Headsetter does not work on your device, please email me.

Find out all the real-time sports wherever you are with Sport.24: results, matches, calendar of events and live rankings. 24/7: 25 sports and 75 events. Soccer, rugby, tennis, formula 1, handball, basket, motorcycle, cycling… Sport24.com application is arranged visually to afford quick and comfortable reading: Fast, modern, fluid and fun! • Lateral navigation : Easy and fast slide between sport home • Configure your application and access to your favorite news by mouse click Stay updated about more than 100 sports and covered live events: soccer (Champions League, Liga, Premier League, Bundesliga, Football World Cup, French Football Cup…), tennis (ATP, Rolland Garros, Wimbledon, Davis Cup…), basket (NBA, Pro A, Euro League…), rugby (Top 14, 6 Nations, Rugby World Cup…), golf, handball, biking (Tour de France, Giro d’Italia…), formula 1, volleyball, motorcycle, rally… All the real-time sports news at your finger tips: • Access to the last news: all the live sport news about your athletes, your teams, the Mercato and the results of your favorite’s competitions. • Be constantly informed thanks to the Flash • Matches Live scoring and live commentary. See the latest scrores and rankings of your favorite’s teams. Never miss a beat! • Live the sport through the section “Multimedia”. You can watch daily updated videos and pictures and highlights from recent games of the leading European leagues, or from other types of sports such as tennis, rugby, basketball, formula 1… • All the news about your favorite soccer’s teams (PSG, OM, Real Madrid, Manchester United, Milano AC, FC Bayern Munchen…), rugby (Saracens, Leicester, Harlequins, Northampton, Gloucester…) and all the news of your favorite players. Find all the Sport24.com various headings : • NEWS : last news about your favorite team, your favorite player and your favorite competition • FLASH : to keep up to date with all the latest real-time news • MULTIMEDIA : new picture and new video everyday • LIVE : matches live scoring • CALENDAR : competition Schedule • STANDING : live standing of your favorite competition

description: Transport routes can be viewed on the map, the application can display your location using GPS support. The user interface is available in Lithuanian, Latvian and English languages. Transport in Riga PRO has the following additional features over the free version: automatic schedule updates (subject to Terms of Use of the application). The PRO version can also display estimated arrival times for a particular route. To view the status of automatic updates, please press Menu-Settings while in the main application screen. Long click on schedule to see estimated arrival times for each particular route. The application has built-in support for the following cities: Riga, Latvia Jelgava, Latvia Liepāja, Latvia Vilnius, Lithuania Kaunas, Lithuania Klaipeda, Lithuania Panevėžys, Lithuania Tallinn, Estonia Please e-mail andris.spruds@inbox.lv in case you have any questions about the app. I can not respond to your comments in Google Play.

description: White Noise: Streams lets you listen to calming sounds of nature set to imagery that will put you in a meditative and relaxing state. Use White Noise to - * Help sleep * Block distractions * Relax/meditate * Take a mental break White Noise audio is downloaded to your SD card the first time you play a track, while being streamed from the Internet. Audio will be played from your device SD card every time after that. Soothing and relaxing audio runs in the background, so you can check email, browse the web, or read a book on your device at the same time. Notification bar shows current audio playing which provides easy access back to the app screen. Download White Noise: Streams today and start relaxing to the sounds of nature. **Note on permissions** Internet access: required for ads Access phone state: pause audio when incoming call is detected and resume when call ends Storage: save audio file to SD card Email spyd3rdroid@gmail.com with any feedback, issues, etc.

description: Αθλητικά νέα για όλες τις ομάδες από τα μεγαλύτερα αθλητικά sites. Η αθλητική ενημέρωση τώρα στην διάθεσή σας πιο εύκολα από ποτέ. Νέα για όλες τις ελληνικές αλλά και ξένες ομάδες μαζεμένα σε μία εφαρμογή. Ολυμπιακός, Παναθηναικός, Π.A.O.K., Ατρόμητος, Α.Ε.Κ., Αστέρας Τρίπολης, Άρης, Ο.Φ.Η., SKODA ΞΑΝΘΗ, Πανιώνιος, Λεβαδειακός, Εργοτέλης, ΠΑΣ Γιάννενα, Παναιτωλικός, Κέρκυρα, Δόξα Δράμας Νέα για ποδοόσφαιρο, μπάσκετ, βόλεϊ καθώς και για άλλα αθλήματα. Προγνωστικά στοιχήματος Η εφαρμογή εμφανίζει είτε τις mobile εκδόσεις των αθλητικών site και σας επιτρέπει γρήγορα να πλοηγηθείτε σ αυτές. Επίσης σε όσα γνωστά site δεν υπάρχει mobile έκδοση, η εφαρμογή εμφανίζει τα πρόσφατα RSS Feeds τους! description: Δοκιμάστε τις γνώσεις σας στο Ποδόσφαιρο! Οι καλύτερες ερωτήσεις του Ελληνικού Ποδοσφαίρου τώρα στο κινητό σας! -Στατιστικά Επιτυχίας -Πολλές ερωτήσεις -Συχνές ανανεώσεις κάθε εβδομάδα -App2SD (android 2.2 και άνω) -Ελληνική Εφαρμογή/Ελληνικό Κουίζ Ενημερώσεις με περισσότερες ποδοσφαιρικές ερωτήσεις, καθώς και περισσότερες επιλογές (π.χ. Ελληνικό Πρωτάθλημα/Ξένες Ομάδες) θα γίνονται κάθε εβδομάδα Ενδεικτικές Ερωτήσεις: Ποια ομάδα κατέκτησε το πρωτάθλημα Α' εθνικής ποδοσφαίρου το έτος 2005-2006; Πόσα πρωταθλήματα Ελλάδας έχει κατακτήσει ο Παναθηναϊκός στο ποδόσφαιρο; Ο Ολυμπιακός ιδρύθηκε το: 1925/1931 Πόσα κύπελα Ελλάδας έχει κερδίσει ο ΠΑΟΚ; Ποιο ήταν το σκορ του τελικού κυπέλου 2008–09, Ολυμπιακός-ΑΕΚ; Πού διεξήχθη ο τελικός κυπέλου 2007–08, Ολυμπιακός-Άρης; Ποιος ήταν ο προπονητής του Παναθηναϊκού την περίοδο 2009-10; Ο Γιώργος Δώνης ήταν προπονητής στον ΠΑΟΚ (Σωστό-Λάθος) Σε τι θέση παίζει ο Κώστας Κατσουράνης; Κατέβασε το κουίζ και παίξε μπαλίτσα! Για οποιοδήποτε σχόλιο/απορία/παράπονο παρακαλώ μη διστάσετε να επικοινωνήσετε μαζί μου στο e-mail μου που εμφανίζεται στο market. Ginger Mail is an exclusive new email client application for MS Exchange. The users can manage their corporate email accounts more user-friendly and effectively. We designed Ginger Mail with simplicity in mind so that you can go anywhere in this application very easily. We have developed Ginger Mail from the scratch and it is not based on any other email client in the market. Users can share almost any photo(s) or files through this application with share option.We are working hard to introduce more features. Note:- Please make sure that EWS(Exchange Web Services) is enabled on your Exchange server(By default EWS is enabled on Exchange server, only few companies disable EWS access). Push notification only supports Office 365, Microsoft Exchange 2010 and above. Limited Period Offer **** The Price is inclusive of all taxes ***** If you are having any login issues, feel free to contact us through swiftmail4u@gmail.com [Features] - Direct Push & pull notification support. - Fully functional Calendar. - Contacts Sync. - Conversation View. - Favorite folders - Smart Folder view - Rich-Text Editor - Search Contacts(GAL) - Widgets - Material design - Themes - Ginger Mail uses built-in Calender of OS. - Ability to Search mails quickly - Move to folder option. - Swipe to Quick Actions - Ability to mark flags and clear flags. - User credentials stored in encrypted format. - Unified Unread,Attachments and Flagged filters. - Supports Exchange 2010 and Office 365. - Contacts(GAL) retrieved from the server while compose mails. - Multiple folder support with rules. - Multiple attachment support. - Inline images download support. - Clean and beautiful user interface. - Pinch to zoom for HTML/Text messages. - Full HTML support. - Multiple selection for deleting and marking flags. - Ability to select, copy and paste. - Delete mail remotely - Uses HTML signature from Exchange OWA. - Draft mail support. - Settings for the ringtones, Sync options,Custom Signature, Peak Time and LED. Ginger Mail doesn't supports Exchange 2003 and 2007. For Office 365 users: Go to manual setup > Domain\name : \ name@yourdomain.com or \ name@yourdomain.onmicrosoft.com ( domain name should be blank) Server URL: outlook.office365.com Select Accept all certificates option Port No : 443 Ginger Mail simply works like Outlook and OWA client.

FastMeteo Pro is the fastest way to get meteo from here up to the world on Android smartphone. FastMeteo lets you to display meteo of your actual city location. FastMeteo uses GPS to refresh your current position and display meteo of your actual city. Current meteo and forecast conditions are available. Besides, FastMeteo allows you to follow meteo for your favorites cities in list or in a world map in which you can display temperature or meteo icon. Moreover, FastMeteo is able to display map meteo for each continent and a large number of countries (France, Germany, Italy, Spain, USA, Brazil, India, Belgium, Switzerland, United Kingdom...). Other countries will be added if people are interested in. Give some comments with country that you would like that I add and I will try to make it to improve FastMeteo. FastMeteo offers others functionalities like : sunrise and sunset informations for your current location, or the possibility to custom user interface thanks to a preferences screen where temperature unit is configurable (celsius or farenheit degrees) and colors also (background, text colors, …). Finally, FastMeteo have 2 widgets (4x1 with simple informations for your current city or a more detailed widget in 4x2 format) to display meteo in fast way in home screen.

気象庁の予報を利用している天気予報アプリです。 ※今後、バージョンアップを行う予定はありませんが、ご了承下さい。 ※解析雨量・降水短時間予報、レーダー・ナウキャストは画像を内部ストレージに保存するため、データ容量を大量に消費します。 目安として、1つの地方（関東など）につき500KB程度になります。 24時間以上前にダウンロードした画像は自動的に削除されるため、しばらく更新しなければデータ容量は小さくなります。 【主な機能】 ・天気予報、アメダス、解析雨量・降水短時間予報、レーダー・ナウキャスト、気象警報・注意報、台風情報、地震情報、こよみ（日の出入り、月の出入り等）のデータを画面表示。 ・天気予報はウィジェット表示も可能。 ・地域を最大6個まで登録可能。 ・定期的な自動更新。 ・天気予報、アメダス、気象警報、地震情報の通知が可能。（PULL型通知） 【注意事項等】 ・バージョンアップ直後は自動更新が停止します。アプリを1度起動すれば自動更新が再開されます。 ・バージョンアップ時に保存された通知履歴がクリアされる事があります。 ・気象警報・注意報を参照する際は、最新のデータを確認するようにしてください。 ・緊急地震速報の機能はありません。 ・通知履歴画面の最大保持期間は24時間（1日）です。 【他】 ・データ取得元は気象庁ホームページ（こよみ以外）、国立天文台ホームページ（こよみ）です。
release_text: 2012/12/31：v0.9.12 ・アメダス地域の練馬を修正。（再設定が必要） 2012/11/17：v0.9.11 ・時系列天気予報を修正。 ・電気予報を削除。 2012/5/3：v0.9.10 ・アプリバージョンアップ時のサービス自動起動の不具合を修正。 2012/5/3：v0.9.9 ・Android3.0以上で設定画面が開かなかった不具合の修正。 ・アプリバージョンアップ時にサービスを自動的に開始するよう修正。 2012/3/31：v0.9.8 ・天気予報情報が更新できない不具合の修正。 2012/2/5：v0.9.7 ・津のアメダス設定を変更。 2011/9/12：v0.9.6 ・地震情報が更新できない不具合の修正。 2011/8/15：v0.9.5 ・台風情報が発表されていない時に異常終了する不具合の修正。 2011/8/9：v0.9.4 ・一部ロジックの変更。 2011/7/25：v0.9.3 ・台風情報が正しく表示されない不具合の修正。 2011/7/19：v0.9.2 ・大分県の地域情報が誤っていた不具合の修正。

description: This is a very popular mobile end game "Do not step on the white pieces " in another version , leisure and entertainment in one fast -paced allows you to have a different thrill ! The game is simple : Do not touch the fingers white keys ! Everyone will play, but not necessarily everyone can control their own fingers ! The game has five modes ( Game score quickly took to the circle of friends to share oh ) : - Classic Mode , test your ability to control . No fastest in the 50 steps , only faster ! Who is the world 's fastest athletes do ? - Arcade mode ( recommended ) , test your coordination. No time, no steps to limit , depending on how far you can go yourself . - Zen mode within 30 seconds to see how many points you can lump . - Speed ​​mode , the speed will be faster , challenge your limits. - Relay mode, 10 seconds to complete the 50 pieces , then there will be more than 10 seconds to complete another 50 pieces , constantly Relay ! Game features: * Simple and easy to play , young and old , can be sent home to work travel + bored weapon * 5 kinds of fun patterns * Wonderful piano sound * Smooth gaming experience * Support social network to share , you can always get to show off their achievements Warning , this game is too easy to indulge with obsessive-compulsive disorder , self-control bad people , please be careful !
release_text: v2.5.0 - Fixed some bugs and made other improvements!

description: Die App ermöglicht Ihnen den Zugriff auf Ihre Konten bei der 1822direkt sowie zusätzlich auf die meisten Konten anderer deutscher Banken und Sparkassen. Beachten Sie bitte, dass ein Konto bei der 1822direkt für die Nutzung der App erforderlich ist. Mit der Banking-App der 1822direkt haben Sie Ihre Finanzen jederzeit im Überblick – wo immer und wann immer Sie wollen. Einfach, komfortabel, intelligent und vor allem sicher. FUNKTIONEN - Multibankenfähigkeit - Kontostand prüfen (Einzel- und Gesamtsaldo) - Umsätze anzeigen (auch vorgemerkte Umsätze) - Bilder an Umsätze hängen (bis zu sechs Bilder pro Umsatz, z.B. für Garantiefälle) - Einzel- und Terminüberweisungen durchführen - inkl. SEPA - Daueraufträge verwalten - inkl. SEPA - Geldautomatenfinder - Alle Konten durchsuchen - Vorlagen verwalten - Auswertungen erstellen (Grafik oder Liste) - Sprachwahl: Deutsch, Englisch, Türkisch (je nach Systemeinstellung Ihres Geräts) UNTERSTÜTZTE SICHERHEITSVERFAHREN - Für Konten der 1822direkt: iTAN - Weitere Verfahren sind bei Fremdinstituten möglich. Bitte erfragen Sie diese direkt bei dem Kreditinstitut. MULTIBANKENFÄHIG Sie können mit der 1822direkt-Banking App beliebig viele Konten bei zahlreichen deutschen Kreditinstituten einrichten, sofern Sie über mindestens ein Konto bei der 1822direkt verfügen. Ihr 1822direkt-Konto muss in der App zur Initialisierung als erstes eingerichtet werden. Danach sind beliebig viele Konten auch von Fremdbanken aktivierbar. Achtung: Die Unterstützung hängt vom jeweiligen Institut ab. Voraussetzung: Ihr Konto muss für das Online-Banking mittels HBCI mit PIN/TAN bzw. FinTS mit PIN/TAN freigeschaltet sein. Nicht unterstützt werden Commerzbank, TARGOBANK, BMW Bank, Volkswagen Bank, Santander Bank, Bank of Scotland und andere. UNTERSTÜTZTE KONTOARTEN (je nach Institut) - Girokonten - Festgeldkonten - Tagesgeldkonten - Depots - Sparkonten - LBS-Bausparkonten - Darlehenskonten - Kreditkartenumsätze bei Sparkassen (keine DKB-Kreditkarte) SICHERHEIT AUF HÖCHSTEM NIVEAU Ihr Geld und Ihre persönlichen Daten sind mit der 1822direkt-Banking App maximal geschützt – entsprechend der Vorgaben der deutschen Kreditinstitute zum Online-Banking. - Kommunikation über geprüfte Schnittstellen - Hohe Verschlüsselung - Schutz durch ein von Ihnen angelegtes individuelles Passwort - Autolock-Funktion zur Sperrung der App - Verschlüsselung der gespeicherten Daten Ihre Finanzen und Daten sind so auch bei Verlust des Gerätes vor dem Zugriff Fremder geschützt. SO EINFACH GEHT'S 1. Laden Sie die App herunter 2. Legen Sie ein Passwort für den App-Zugang fest 3. Richten Sie Ihre Bankkonten ein - mit denselben Zugangsdaten wie beim 1822direkt-Online-Banking bzw. wie auf der Webseite Ihrer Bank oder Sparkasse SUPPORT - Brauchen Sie Hilfe bei der Einrichtung Ihrer Bankverbindungen oder Nutzung der App? Schauen Sie einfach in den FAQs oder in der Hilfe-Funktion direkt in der App nach oder senden Sie eine E-Mail an support@1822direkt.de . - Sollten Sie Ergänzungen oder Fehlerhinweise zu unserer App haben, können Sie uns gerne eine Mitteilung direkt aus der App zuschicken (optional inkl. Sendeprotokoll). - Bitte beachten Sie, dass für die Nutzung der Geldautomatensuche die Google-Play-Dienste installiert sein müssen The app allows you to access your accounts at 1822direkt and in addition to most accounts of other German banks and savings banks. Note that an account with the 1822direkt is required for our use of the app. With the banking app 1822direkt you have your finances at any time at a glance - wherever and whenever you want. Simple, convenient, intelligent and above all safe. FUNCTIONS - Multi-bank capability - Check account balance (individual and overall balance) - View transactions (also earmarked revenues) - Images of revenues depend (up to six images per turnover, eg for warranty) - Single and date remittances to perform - including SEPA. - Manage standing orders - including SEPA. - ATM Finder - Browse all accounts - Manage Templates - Create Indexes (graphic or list) - Language: German, English, Turkish (depending on system settings of your device) SUPPORTED SAFETY PROCEDURES - For accounts 1822direkt: iTAN - Other methods are possible with foreign institutions. Please contact them directly at the bank. MULTI BANK OPERATIONAL You can set up with the 1822direkt banking app as many accounts at several German banks, provided you have at least one account at 1822direkt. 1822direkt your account must be set up in the app to initialize first. Then are many accounts of foreign banks also activated. Note: The support depends on the institution. Prerequisite: Your account must be activated for online banking using HBCI PIN / TAN or FinTS with PIN / TAN. Are not supported Commerzbank, Citibank, BMW Bank, Volkswagen Bank, Santander Bank, Bank of Scotland and others. ACCOUNT TYPES SUPPORTED (depending on the institution) - Current accounts - Time deposits - Money market accounts - Depots - Savings accounts - LBS building society accounts - Loan accounts - Credit card transactions at savings banks (DKB-no credit card) SAFETY AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL Your money and your personal information remains protected with 1822direkt banking app - in accordance with the requirements of the German banks for online banking. - Communication via certified interfaces - High Encryption - Protection by an applied you individual password - Autolock function for disabling the app - Encryption of stored data Your finances and data are protected in case of loss of the device before accessing stranger. SO IT'S EASY 1 Download the app 2 Specify a password for the app access 3 Set up your bank accounts - with the same credentials as the 1822direkt online banking or as the website of your bank or building society SUPPORT - Need help in setting up your bank account or use the app? Just look at the FAQ or Help function directly in the app now or send an e-mail to support@1822direkt.de . - If you have additions or error information to our app, please send us a message directly from the app send (optionally including transmission protocol.). - Please note that the use of ATMs Search Google Play services must be installed
release_text: Neues in Version 2.8.2: • Komfortablere Zahlungen innerhalb Europas: Für Zahlungen (z.B. Überweisungen) in die meisten europäischen Länder ist nur noch die Eingabe einer IBAN notwendig – die Eingabe einer BIC entfällt. • Kleinere Fehlerbehebungen und zahlreiche Verbesserungen Dies ist ggf. das letzte Update. Mit einer neuen App werden wir Ihr Banking in Kürze noch komfortabler machen. Sind Sie mit unserer Arbeit zufrieden? Wir freuen uns auf Ihr Feedback.

description: The hit new Deckbuilding game comes to Android! Here are some of the things game reviewers are saying about Star Realms: "My readers are going to have a seizure about how good Star Realms is." -Owen Faraday, pockettactics.com “Good on all levels, thumbs up!” -Tom Vasel, The Dice Tower “This game is superb! I think it’s a brilliant game. Beautiful artwork, second to none. “ -Tim Norris, Grey Elephant Gaming “What can I say? description: Welcome to the best search app on the Market! Quick Search widget allows you to browse your device and the web from a single app, giving you easy and fast access to everything on your phone! With our super easy to use interface, and super-fast auto complete you can search, locate and activate everything on your phone – • Easy access to all your apps • Browse through your music collection • Locate contacts on your phone • Browse through your messages In addition, Quick Search widget gives you access to web/internet search and offers suggestions according to your search. If you have apps like IMDB, Yelp, Memos installed on your app, Quick Search box will also show search results from these apps for easy access to the info you seek. Another great feature of this app is the ability to search the web when you copy any text from your phone. For example – you read an article about a place you never heard about, simply copy the text from the browser and you’ll see the widget pop in the bottom of your screen. Click it and you’ll go straight to a search page! Permissions Explained: NETWORK COMMUNICATION: FULL INTERNET ACCESS - Allows an application to create network sockets YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION: READ BROWSER’S HISTORY AND BOOKMARKS - To return search results from your bookmarks. READ CONTACT DATA - – To return search results from your contact list. Your Messages: Read SMS or MMS - To return results from your messages. PHONE CALLS: READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY – For use of device ID number. NETWORK COMMUNICATION: VIEW WI-FI STATE - Allows an application to view the information about the state of Wi-Fi.

If this happens to you, and 'Restore Premium' button is not helping, please use this work around: - open device settings - open apps tab, Little Crane - uninstall - open google play store and download again. - launch game, it will say 'restoring purchases'. description: Now featuring the voice of Nancy O'Dell!! StoryChimes is proud to partner with Nancy O'Dell (co-host of Entertainment Tonight) in raising funds for the Muscular Dystrophy Association. Nancy has lent her voice to our Rapunzel StoryChimes! Proceeds benefit Betty's Battle, a foundation Nancy formed with MDA in honor of her mother who passed away from Lou Gehrig's disease in 2008. Download it today to enjoy with your kids today, knowing it may help in the effort to find a cure. Please visit: www.bettysbattle.org and www.als-mda.org for more information. RAPUNZEL **A PTPA AWARD WINNER!*** ABOUT RAPUNZEL Up for a little tangled affair? Then read the Rapunzel StoryChimes! Rapunzel is the classic tale about a beautiful young girl who is a victim of circumstance. She’s trapped in an isolated tower deep in the forest. The evil sorceress has her held captive against her will. Only the young prince can save her from her lonely fate. Enjoy the read! StoryChimes Application Description  StoryChimes are an affordable diverse collection of children’s stories designed to immerse your child in the sights and sounds of interactive tales while keeping the “feel” of turning the pages of a real book. As we like to say, “When you hear the chime, turn the page!” StoryChimes’ stream of new titles will keep you coming back for more fun, adventure and education again and again. The ease-of-use makes it a snap for even the youngest kids to enjoy a StoryChime today. Mom or Dad need a good distraction? No matter how you travel or where you are, StoryChimes are never more than a touch away. An entire collection of books in the palm of your hand, providing a great assortment of entertainment. StoryChimes are the perfect alternative to movies, tv shows and video games. With StoryChimes you can entertain and educate at the same time. Grab one today! FEATURES: - Now includes a match game! - Karaoke like text scroll (highlights red as you read) - Page indexing to access your favorite parts - Bookmarking to pick up where you left off - Read at your own pace without audio and scroll text - Facebook integration - E-mail a friend about the App - Help menu - Larger page turn area - 3D page turn provides a tactile “feel” - Beautiful illustrations - Great music accompanies each story - Enhanced with sound FX Please visit us on the web at www.storychimes.com for more great stories! Have a story suggestion or comment? We’d love to hear it. Drop us a line at info@storychimes.com .

description: Enfin une application qui vous permet de consulter sur votre mobile le niveau du Lac St-Jean rapidement et facilement. L'application affiche le niveau actuel ainsi que le niveau d'il y a 7 jours et la prévision pour dans 3 jours. Il est aussi possible de consulter le détail sur dix jours (les 7 derniers jours ainsi que les 3 prochains). L'application enregistre la dernière lecture sur votre mobile pour ainsi être consultée si vous n'avez plus accès au réseau. L'écran s'adapte et affiche plus d'information si vous êtes sur une tablette. Une version payante sans publicité est aussi disponible. ( http://goo.gl/fB8PY ) Avant de mette un commentaire négatif, SVP m'envoyer un courriel et il me fera plaisir de corriger la situation et d'envoyer une mise à jour. Testé sur : - Nexus S - Motorola Xoom Les informations sur les différents niveau du lac St-Jean proviennent du site Web de Rio Tinto Alcan d'Énergie électrique. Cette application n'est pas sous la responsabilité de Rio Tinto Alcan et l'information dans celle-ci doit être utilisée à vos risque et sans garantie. Le lac St-Jean est situé au Saguenay / Lac St-Jean, Québec, Canada. Les principales villes sur les berges ou près de celui-ci sont : Alma, Chambord, Desbiens, Dolbeau, Mistassini, Hébertville, Péribonka, Roberval, Sainte-Monique, Saint-Félicien, Saint-Gédéon, Jonquiere, Chicoutimi. Il est possible de pratiquer la navigation en bateau et la pêche. Version 1.4 - Ajout validation lorsque la source de données n'est pas à jour. Version 1.3.1 - Maintenant l'application n'est plus une version d'essaie mais une version complète avec publicité. Version 1.2 - Ajout d'un marqueur pour signaler la journée courante sur l'affichage de l'historique - Alignement du texte historique pour les tablettes - Correction mineure d'affichage pour les hauteurs sous les 10 pieds Finally an application that allows you to view on your mobile level of Lac St-Jean quickly and easily. The application displays the current level and the level of 7 days ago and the forecast in three days. It is also possible to view the details of ten days (the last seven days and the next 3). The application saves the last reading on your mobile so be consulted if you do not have network access. The screen changes and displays more information if you are on a tablet. A paid ad-free version is also available. (Http://goo.gl/fB8PY) Before put a negative comment, please send me an email and I will be happy to rectify the situation and send an update. Tested on:   - Nexus S   - Motorola Xoom Information on the different level of Lake St. John from the website Rio Tinto Alcan Electrical energy. This application is not the responsibility of Rio Tinto Alcan and the information in it to be used with your risk and without warranty. Lake St-Jean is located in the Saguenay / Lac St-Jean, Quebec, Canada. The main cities on or near the banks of the latter are: Alma, Chambord, Desbiens, Dolbeau Mistassini, Hébertville, Peribonka, Roberval, Saint Monica, Saint-Felicien Saint-Gedeon, Jonquiere, Chicoutimi. It is possible to practice sailing boat and fishing. Version 1.4 - Added validation when the data source is outdated. Version 1.3.1 - Now the application is not a trial version but a full version with advertising. Version 1.2 - Adding a marker to indicate the current day on the history display - Alignment of historical text for tablets - Fixed minor display for heights below 10 feet

Shikwa (Urdu: شکوہ‎) and Jawab-e-Shikwa (Urdu: جواب شکوہ‎) are poems written by well known Urdu language poet Muhammad Iqbal, which were later published in his book Kulliat-e-Iqbal. "Shikwa" is an Urdu word which translates to "complaint" in English. Shikwa (1909) and Jawab-i-Shikwa (1913) extol the legacy of Islam and its civilising role in history, bemoan the fate of Muslims everywhere, and squarely confront the dilemmas of Islam in modern times. Shikwa is thus, in the form of a complaint to Allah for having let down the Muslims and Jawab-i-Shikwa is Allah's reply. When the first part of these poems, Shikwa (1909), was published it created a big confusion amongst Muslim scholars who thought that Iqbal is being rude and harsh in his words when talking to God in his book and being unthankfull of the blessings of God since the second part of his poem (Jawab-e-Shikwa) was not announced with Publication of the first one. But later when Jawab-e-Shikwa (1913) was published all the problems went away and everyone praised Iqbal for his contribution to Urdu Poetry and making a difference in Islamic literature.

- No requiere conexión a Internet para su funcionamiento - Diseño e interfaz gráfica agradable - Crear notas a los versículos - Buscador de palabras - Compartir versículos con los contactos por: Correo, Facebook, Twiter, etc. - Versión Reina Valera La Biblia (del griego τα βιβλία, ta biblía, ‘los libros’) es el conjunto de libros canónicos del judaísmo y el cristianismo. La canonicidad de cada libro varía dependiendo de la tradición adoptada. Según las religiones judía y cristiana, transmite la palabra de Dios. La Biblia ha sido traducida a 2303 idiomas La Biblia es una recopilación de textos que en un principio eran documentos separados (llamados «libros»), escritos primero en hebreo, arameo y griego durante un periodo muy dilatado y después reunidos para formar el Tanaj (Antiguo Testamento para los cristianos) y luego el Nuevo Testamento. Ambos testamentos forman la Biblia cristiana. En sí, los textos que componen la Biblia fueron escritos a lo largo de aproximadamente 1000 años (entre el 900 a. C. y el 100 d. C.). Los textos más antiguos se encuentran en el Libro de los Jueces («Canto de Débora») y en las denominadas fuentes "E" (tradición elohísta) y "J" (tradición yahvista) de la Torá (llamada Pentateuco por los cristianos), que son datadas en la época de los dos reinos (siglos X a VIII a. C.). El libro completo más antiguo, el de Oseas es también de la misma época. El pueblo judío identifica a la Biblia con el Tanaj, no consintiendo bajo ningún concepto el término Antiguo Testamento y no acepta la validez del llamado Nuevo Testamento, reconociéndose como texto sagrado únicamente al Tanaj. El canon de la Biblia que conocemos hoy fue sancionado por la Iglesia católica, bajo el pontificado de san Dámaso I, en el Sínodo de Roma del año 382, y esta versión es la que Jerónimo de Estridón tradujo al latín. Dicho canon consta de 73 libros: 46 constitutivos del llamado Antiguo Testamento, incluyendo 7 libros llamados actualmente Deuterocanónicos (Tobit, Judit, I Macabeos, II Macabeos, Sabiduría, Eclesiástico y Baruc) ―que han sido impugnados por judíos y protestantes― y 27 del Nuevo Testamento. Fue confirmado en el Concilio de Hipona en el año 393, y ratificado en los Concilios III de Cartago, en el año 397, y IV de Cartago, en el año 419. Cuando reformadores protestantes lo impugnaron, el canon católico fue nuevamente confirmado por decreto en la cuarta sesión del Concilio de Trento del 8 de abril de 1546. Ninguna de estas decisiones fue reconocida ni asumida por muchos protestantes, surgidos a partir del siglo XVI, ni por distintas denominaciones vinculadas al protestantismo surgidas a partir del siglo XIX. El canon de las Biblias cristianas ortodoxas es aún más amplio que el canon de las Biblias católicas romanas, e incluye el Salmo 151, la Oración de Manasés, el Libro III de Esdras y el Libro III de los Macabeos. En adición a estos, el Libro IV de Esdras y el Libro IV de los Macabeos figuran, asimismo, como apéndices en muchas importantes versiones y ediciones de la Biblia cristiana ortodoxa. El Antiguo Testamento narra principalmente la historia de los hebreos y el Nuevo Testamento la vida, muerte y resurrección de Jesús, su mensaje y la historia de los primeros cristianos. El Nuevo Testamento fue escrito en lengua griega koiné. En él se cita con frecuencia al Antiguo Testamento de la versión de los Setenta, traducción al griego del Antiguo Testamento realizada en Alejandría (Egipto) en el siglo III a. C. - No Internet connection required for operation - Design and nice GUI - Create notes to verses - Search words - Share verses with contacts: Email, Facebook, Twitter, etc.. - King James Version The Bible (from Greek τα βιβλία, ta Bible, 'books') is the set of canonical books of Judaism and Christianity. The canonicity of each book varies depending on the tradition adopted. According to Jewish and Christian religions, spread the word of God. The Bible has been translated into 2303 languages The Bible is a collection of texts that were originally separate documents (called "books"), written first in Hebrew, Aramaic and Greek for a very dilated and then assembled to form the Tanakh (Old Testament for Christians) and then the New Testament. Both testaments form the Christian Bible. In itself, the texts that make up the Bible were written over approximately 1000 years (from 900 to. C. and 100 d. C.). The oldest texts are in the Book of Judges ("Song of Deborah") and so-called sources "E" (Elohist tradition) and "J" (Yahwist tradition) of the Torah (Pentateuch by Christians call), which is dated at the time of the two kingdoms (tenth to eighth. C.). The oldest complete book, that of Hosea is also from the same era. The Jewish people in the Bible identifies the Tanakh, not indulging in any way the term Old Testament and does not accept the validity of the so-called New Testament, recognized as sacred only the Tanakh text. The canon of the Bible we know today was sanctioned by the Catholic Church under Pope Damasus I, at the Synod of Rome in the year 382, ​​and this version is the Estridón Jerome translated into Latin. This charge consists of 73 books: 46 constituting the so-called Old Testament, including 7 now called Deuterocanonical books (Tobit, Judith, Maccabees, II Maccabees, Wisdom, Sirach, and Baruch), which have been challenged by Jews and Protestants, and 27 of New Testament. It was confirmed at the Council of Hippo in 393, and ratified by the Councils III of Carthage, in 397, and IV of Carthage in the year 419. When I challenged Protestant reformers, the Catholic canon was again confirmed by decree in the fourth session of the Council of Trent of April 8, 1546. None of these decisions was recognized and accepted by many Protestants, arising from the XVI century, and by various names linked to Protestantism emerged from the nineteenth century. The canon of orthodox Christian Bibles is even broader than the canon of Roman Catholic Bibles, including Psalm 151, the Prayer of Manasseh, the third book of Ezra and the Book III of the Maccabees. In addition to these, the Book IV of IV Esdras and the Book of Maccabees are also important as appendices in many versions and editions of the Bible Christian Orthodox. The Old Testament tells the story mainly Jews and the New Testament, the life, death and resurrection of Jesus, his message and the history of the early Christians. The New Testament was written in Koine Greek. It is frequently quoted the Old Testament of the Septuagint, the Greek translation of the Old Testament produced at Alexandria (Egypt) in the third century. C.

description: The Biblical Story of Moses & the Red Sea in an Incredible Interactive Book for Kids! Meet Moses and Join the Israelites as they Flee Egypt & Pharaoh’s Army! Teach Young Children the Biblical Passover Story with Smart Puzzles & Games! The Biblical story of Moses and Passover comes to life in a fantastic interactive book made for young kids. Kids will get a feeling for ancient Egypt through the cleverly designed HD graphics and interactive elements that teach children about Moses, the Ten Plagues, Pharaoh, the Hebrew slaves in ancient Egypt and the parting of the Red Sea. Parents will love to read this book to their children or have them read aloud with the narration. This lovely Bible story is perfect for Passover! Exciting and educational games on each book page! ★ Jigsaw puzzles - Awesome puzzles enhance the story and promote critical thinking skills ★ Paint-a-Picture - Dozens of coloring pages and paints take you to ancient Egypt ★ Memory Match - Fire up your child’s memory skills with this smart game! ★ Placement Puzzle - Place a character in their puzzle piece - a fun puzzle game! The Moses story, a favorite Passover story from the Bible, is simply told and beautifully illustrated with perfectly chosen music as a backdrop to the narrative. It is a wonderful complement to religious school education. Smart puzzles and matching games that coordinate with the story reinforce the education of the Passover story as well. What's inside ★ Help the Hebrew Slaves heave a brick for Pharaoh’s pyramid ★ Touch the Burning Bush as Moses Gets his commandment from God ★ Turn Aharon’s stick into a snake to show Pharaoh God’s power ★ Touch each of the 10 Plagues and see how it wreaks havoc on the Egyptians Meet Baby Moses when his mother saves him from the evil Pharaoh by placing him in a basket to float along the River Nile. It is Pharaoh’s daughter who finds the baby and names him Moses. Interact with the Hebrew slaves as they build the pyramids and follow Moses along his journey to free his people. Play with camels, and travel through the desert with Moses as he leads the Israelites out of Egypt and to the Promised Land. Features ★ “Play” - Automatically reads each page of the story to you ★ “Read it Myself” - Allows you to control the reading yourself ★ “Auto Play” - Automatically reads the entire story to you ★ “Record your Voice” - You can tell the story too! Record yourself on every page and play the biblical characters ABOUT TabTale With over 850 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. TabTale’s interactive storybooks provide an exciting reading experience for the most beloved children's stories. Each book inspires young children’s creativity and imagination. Search “TabTale” on Google Play and discover more outstanding apps. Visit us: http://www.tabtale.com/ Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/+Tabtale/posts Like us: http://www.facebook.com/TabTale Follow us: @Tabtale Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/iTabtale CONTACT US Let us know what you think! Talking Baby Bear is one of those talking games which you will want to show off as much as possible. It is a good combination of a time killer and creativity game due to its dress up feature. Talking cat, parrot or dinosaur will be out of question once you start talking and playing with your baby bear. Kids love talking animals, but don't we all? Download the game and start your own little bear story! Try out the game features: ✔ Press the kiss icon to get a bear kiss, ✔ Press the flower icon to see the cute bear smell a flower, ✔ Choose the dress up icon and play dress up games with your teddy bear. Make sure you choose the right background to fit the looks, ✔ Poke, pet and tickle the bear to see what it can do, ✔ Talk to your little bear and it will repeat everything you say in a funny voice. Teddy bears are a part of childhood most of us share. If you are tired of talking cat apps, try out some other talking animals games. You will definitely enjoy this new cool game of Talking Baby Bear. Just because you might be too old to play with actual stuffed animals, it doesn't mean you can't do it in a 3D game. Don't hesitate! Download the talking app to your Android phone or tablet and play the baby teddy bear game for as long as you like! ** This game is an intellectual property of DigitalEagle – copyright 2014 **

Once you add the silly outfit to the funny voice, Toby the cat that talks will become your mood maker for bad and good days all year around. Do not hesitate! *** NEW *** Samsung Multi-window & Google Drive View TIFF, JPEG, PNG, and more. Includes advanced features like slideshow, show on map, rotate, crop, resize, save-as, set-as-wallpaper, share, export to PDF and more. It can view a wide variety of image formats including: TIFF (TIF) - single or multiple pages, (Uncompressed, Packbits, LZW, JPEG, Huffman, G31D, G32D, G4, Flate, Planar) BMP (Windows, OS/2, RLE) DICOM (uncompressed, RLE, JPEG, animated) CALS (type 1) JEDMICS C4 (US Military images) GIF (Animates in viewer and file browser) FLI/FLC (Animates in viewer and file browser) PNG (all types and animates in viewer and file browser) PGM/PBM/PPM JPEG (baseline, progressive) PCX,DCX (multipage PCX) Targa (uncompressed, RLE) QuickLinks FAX Microsoft FAX (*.AWD) WinFAX BitFAX FITS (astronomy images) PDF - NOTE: PDF support is limited to scanned images such as FAXes, NOT text or vector graphics. FIV now collects anonymous usage data through Google Analytics - opt-out in the settings This app uses Pollfish SDK to deliver targeted surveys to its users. We reserve the right to use and disclose the collected, non-personal data, collected for better survey targeting and distribution by Pollfish. Pollfish may use demographic and geo-location information, previous collected answers, as well as information logged from your hardware or device to ensure that relevant surveys are presented to this app's users. Pollfish may collect and use data, for such purposes, including (when available and authorized by app's permissions or after user's consent) but not limited to data such as IP address, Advertising ID, Network information, MAC address, IMEI, installed software, hardware type, Operating System information, previous users' answers and others. Pollfish relates these data only after user's consent. The foregoing data may be used and disclosed in accordance with this Privacy policy and the Privacy policy of Pollfish. Pollfish may display to you behaviorally targeted surveys. If you wish to opt-out from Pollfish surveys you can do that by disabling advertising in your phone's Google Account settings. FIV detects ad blocking by looking at the /etc/hosts file and displays a warning message if Google or Admob server requests are being redirected to localhost. Some Cyanogenmod builds include a modified hosts file setup to block ads, so even if you haven't installed an ad blocker program your device is blocking ads. In the file explorer, long-press on the filename for the option to share the image (email, mms, etc) or set it as the background wallpaper. FIV is great at viewing large black & white scanned images. Unique technology allows for incredibly fast decoding and readable scale-to-gray (anti-aliased) views. Navigate between pages/files in milliseconds even on less powerful phones. FIV supports animated GIF, PNG and FLI/FLC in a unique way. See your files animate in the file browser and main window. Pinch zoom and pan while image is animating. FIV is able to view just about any image, but is also a competent animated GIF/PNG player. Friendly GUI allows fast navigation between pages/files with simple swipe gestures and pinch-to-zoom. Use FIV as a stand-alone file browser/viewer or as the default image viewer for email attachments etc. FIV is capable of viewing well logs faster than any other software available. As an oil/gas/water well log viewer, FIV can open scans up to 80 x 300 inches (@400dpi). FIV now includes the ability to export any file (e.g. multi-page TIFF) as a PDF file. It also allows you to save a page in another format (JPEG, PNG, PDF, TIFF, BMP). The only difference between the free and paid version of FIV are the use of ads in the free version Please check our Twitter feed for the latest news: @TDF_Software FIV has no external dependencies. The imaging code is completely self contained and written in portable C and optimized assembly language. Please send any licensing requests to tdfsoftware@gmail.com .

description: Did you ever have to book a meeting when you were on the run but couldn’t see the availabilities of your attendees or conference rooms? Well booking meetings with Outlook just got better with our BookMeeting mobile app! You can now quickly book a meeting when on-the-go by selecting your attendees, location and confirming their availabilities without delay. No more rescheduled meetings because of lack of availability info! Main features of Book Meeting: • Connect to Outlook exchange server to check a contact or location’s availability • Add, delete or modify a list of contacts • Add, delete or modify meeting details (meeting subject, time, and description) Workflow: • Add your exchange details in settings • Add contacts you want to use • Check contacts for meeting from the list and click check • Choose a time slot and go.

Aplikácia Telekom je určená primárne pre zákazníkov mobilných služieb spoločnosti Slovak Telekom. Prihlásiť sa môžete cez dátovú mobilnú sieť (pri vypnutom WiFi pripojení), pomocou mena a hesla ktoré používate na moj.telekom.sk alebo zadaním mobilného čísla a ID kódu. Ak máte viac telefónnych čísiel, môžete si ich pridať do aplikácie a následne zobrazovať spotrebu pre vybrané číslo. Pridať si môžete čísla zo spoločnej faktúry, ľubovoľné mobilné číslo alebo zariadenie služby Flash-OFDM. Nové aj existujúce číslo si môžete kedykoľvek premenovať pre lepší prehľad. Prepínanie medzi číslami v aplikácii je veľmi jednoduché, stačí zvoliť prvú položku menu a vybrať si číslo ktorého spotreba sa má zobraziť. Obsah aplikácie Telekom: • Spotreba – podrobné informácie o aktuálnej spotrebe hlasových a dátových služieb • Profil – zákaznícke údaje, program služieb, dátum aktivácie, dátum konca viazanosti programu • Faktúry – zoznam faktúr, detail a úhrada faktúry, informácia o faktúre čakajúcej na úhradu, nastavenie emailu pre zasielanie faktúry, vysvetlivky k jednotlivým položkám faktúry • Elektronický podrobný výpis • Easy – aktuálny kredit, dobitie kreditu, exspirácia SIM karty a kreditu • Chytrý balík - objednajte si televíziu, internet a pevnú linku v balíku služieb • Rodičovské služby - zobrazenie a dobitie kreditu na Easy karte priradenej k paušálu • Roaming – informácie o prenesených dátach v zahraničí • Produktové informácie o paušáloch Happy • Prenos čísla do Telekomu • Zoznam a mapa predajní Telekom • Správa účtu – spravujte si čísla pridané do aplikácie Pre aktiváciu a používanie aplikácie Telekom je potrebné mobilné dátové, alebo WiFi pripojenie. Telekom application is designed primarily for mobile customers Slovak Telekom. You can log in via the mobile data network (at off WiFi connection), using the username and password that you use to moj.telekom.sk or entering mobile number and ID code. If you have multiple phone numbers, you can add them into the application and then show consumption for the selected number. You can add a number of common invoice number or any mobile device services Flash-OFDM. New and existing number, you can rename any time for a better view. Switch between numbers in the application is very easy, just select the first menu item and choose the number which consumption will be displayed. Content applications Telekom: • Consumption - detailed information about the actual consumption of voice and data services • Profile - customer data, program service activation date, end date of the commitment program • Invoices - list of invoices, payment details and invoices, details of pending invoice payment, setup email for sending invoices, explanations for each item on the invoice • Electronic detailed listing • Easy - the current credit, credit conquer, expiration SIM card and credit • Smart Package - Order television, internet and landline bundled service • Parent Services - view and conquer the Easy credit card assigned to the fee • Roaming - information transferred data abroad • Product information on inclusive Happy • Porting to Telekom • List and map stores Telekom • Account Management - manage a number added to the application To activate and use applications Telekom need mobile data or WiFi connection.

Features * Size 1x1, 1x2, 1x3, 2x1, 2x2 and 3x1 * 9 different Widget Layouts * User defined Folder Icons * User defined Text Color and Size * Unlimited number of Apps can be linked to a Folder * Unlimited number of Contacts can be linked to a Folder * Unlimited number of Bookmarks can be linked to a Folder * User defined Background color. It seems many Beam Calculations apps only give you what you can find in the appendix of most engineering textbooks. Why get a beam calculation app that only does the bar minimum and provides standard template for beam analysis. Easy beam can handle any beam, simple or very complex. Easy Beam allows you to easily and swiftly calculate reaction forces, shear, moment, slope, deflection and stress diagrams for beam analysis. What sets Easy Beam apart from other apps is its ability to customize a beam however you need it to be to suit your beam analysis and the sleekness of the app - drawing everything to your screen how you want it. Easy Beam follows along the principles of statics and dynamics, mechanics of materials, and solid mechanics and is thus very applicable to structure engineering and mechanical engineering. Easy Beam makes is a perfect tool for engineering students to accompany homework problems and check for solutions to their statics, mechanics of materials, or solid mechanics problems. It is also very usable for professionals in structural and mechanical engineering to make quick calculations regarding beam calculations. Easy Beam supports two modes: Statically Determinate Beam, and Continuous Beam. In the Statically Determinate section you are able to put point loads, distributed loads, triangle distributed loads, and moments anywhere on the beam. Essentially you can customize it however you like provided it is statically determinate. You can now draw out shear and moment diagrams. Create a cross section and you can do a bending stress analysis on the beam. Enter in a material or a custom elastic modulus and you can see the deflection graph for the beam. At any time you can see your current loads on the main menu. In the Continuous Beam section you can have multiple spans. This section supports span distributed loads as well as point loads anywhere on the beam. The idea is the same but the setup includes defining the lengths of each span, and moments of inertias of each span etc. The Continuous Beam section is perfect for structure engineers who need a more advanced beam analysis that requires multiple spans. The Continuous Beam utilizes the Three Moment Equation which is a robust technique for solving reaction forces, shear and moment, and slope and deflection of continuous beams. Easy Beam also takes care of the units for you and does conversions on the spot. It also has the elastic modulus of many common materials stored for convenience. Easy beam also calculates area moment of inertia for you whether you have a rectangular, circular, hollow, or I-Beam cross section. Or just input your custom area moment of inertia. Statics, Mechanics of Materials, and Solid Mechanics have just become much easier and convenient with Easy Beam. Easy Beam was created by an Engineer for other Engineers, student or professional. Easy Beam allows you to make back of the envelope Beam Calculations in seconds or reduce Statics, Mechanics of Materials, and Solid Mechanics homeworks from hours to minutes. Interactive graphs allow the user to pinpoint shear and moment anywhere on the beam or determine where the max deflection will occur in their beam analysis. That's because Easy Beam's graph allow the user to use a seek bar to move a cursor along the graphs. By default, the graphs also display local min and max values on the screen for your convenience. All in all, Easy Beam allows you to conduct Beam Calculations be it for Statics, Mechanics of Materials, Solid Mechanics, Structural Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or whatever else you may need. Solving shear and moment problems takes no time and continuous beams are very easy to check and solve. I hope you enjoy Easy Beam.

This is a very easy to use, intuitive, and efficient unit converter app. Unit Converter also allows you to back-convert adding convenience and ease. Unit Conveter allows you to convert the following: - Area - Density - Energy/Work - Length - Mass - Power - Pressure - Temperature - Time - Velocity - Volume This makes it the perfect app for engineering and science majors attending a university, or for professionals who often need to convert between units.

Αντίστροφη μέτρηση * Ταχύμετρο - οδόμετρο (και σε μέτρα ανά δευτερόλεπτο για τους πεζούς) * Συντόμευση στην ιστοσελίδα της Γενικής Γραμματείας Πολιτικής Προστασίας * Ενημέρωση (live) για σεισμούς από το Ευρωπαϊκό-Μεσογειακό Σεισμολογικό Κέντρο (μόνο στα Αγγλικά) * Περιστροφή οθόνης (κατ'επιλογή) στην "Τρέχουσα θέση μου" (ιδανικό για Tablets) * Βελτιώθηκε σημαντικά ο χρόνος απόκρισης του προγράμματος στην "Τρέχουσα θέση μου" * Περισσότερα τηλέφωνα στην λίστα έκτακτης ανάγκης * Σας δίνει την δυνατότητα να αποθηκεύετε και να μοιράζεστε τα άρθρα -------------------------- Σχετικά με την εφαρμογή: * Περιέχει συνοπτικό οδηγό πρώτων βοηθειών (ΔΕΝ απαιτεί σύνδεση στο internet) * Λίστα με τηλέφωνα έκτακτης ανάγκης (Με ένα κλικ κάνει άμεση κλήση) * Εύρεση της τρέχουσας θέσης σας (συντεταγμένες, υψόμετρο και διεύθυνσης) με την χρήση GPS, AGPS, WiFi, CellID και εμφάνιση στον χάρτη με επιλογή δορυφορικής απεικόνισης Αποστολή της τρέχουσας θέσης σας με email ή SMS σε περίπτωση έκτακτης ανάγκης * Φακός (με την χρήση του φλας ή της οθόνης) και σε διάφορα χρώματα (μόνο για την οθόνη) * Καιρός (meteo.gr) * Ενημέρωση (live) για σεισμούς από το Ευρωπαϊκό-Μεσογειακό Σεισμολογικό Κέντρο (μόνο στα Αγγλικά) * Χρονόμετρο - αντίστροφη μέτρηση * Ταχύμετρο - οδόμετρο * Συντόμευση στην ιστοσελίδα της Γενικής Γραμματείας Πολιτικής Προστασίας an indispensable tool (Swiss Army knife type) for all the volunteers and rescuers * Articles First Aid * Daily fire risk map (Civil Protection) * Map Fire (live) * Points of Interest (POI) * General forecast next day (meteo.gr) * Ski Resorts (meteo.gr) * Forecast seas (meteo.gr) * Stopwatch - Countdown * Speedometer - Odometer (in meters per second for pedestrians) * Shortcut to the website of the General Secretariat for Civil Protection * Update (live) earthquakes of the European-Mediterranean Seismological Centre (English only) * Rotate Screen (optional) to "my current location" (ideal for Tablets) * Significantly improved the response time of the program on "Current position me" * More phones in the list of emergency * Allows you to store and share the articles -------------------------- About the application: * Includes first aid handbook (no connection to the internet) * A list of emergency numbers (With a click makes a direct call) * Find your current location (coordinates, altitude and direction) using GPS, AGPS, WiFi, CellID and look on the map by selecting imagery Send your current location via email or SMS in case of emergency * Lens (using flash or screen) and in various colors (only for display) * Weather (meteo.gr) * Update (live) earthquakes of the European-Mediterranean Seismological Centre (English only) * Stopwatch - Countdown * Speedometer - Odometer * Shortcut to the website of the General Secretariat for Civil Protection

description: With this application you can mount any directory on your phone, including memory card, as a drive on Windows or Linux. You can also use a WebDAV client to browse a phone directory. This application has been tested using Windows8 Explorer (should also work with Windows7 but it will not work on WindowsXP) and WebDAV client bitkinex. You can download it from http://www.bitkinex.com/ Special thanks to: Beatriz Vera, Peter Ulrich, Gabor Fodor, Manuela Merino García and Anna Rainieri. Implemented Intents com.theolivetree.webdavserver.StartWebDavServer com.theolivetree.webdavserver.StopWebDavServer You can find a lock setting to specify how the device should be kept awake while server is running. There are three modes available: New locks used *SCREEN_DIM_WAKE_LOCK : Existing mode. Screen is on so energy consumption is higher. Use this mode if connections is dropped. *WIFI_MODE_FULL : New mode. Screen is off so device will use less energy while server is running but data connection can be dropped. It is not recommended to use this mode. *WIFI_MODE_FULL_HIGH_PERF: New mode only available on Android >= 3.1. Screen is off so energy consumption should be less than in the first mode. This mode is recommended to save energy but you might find problems so you might to select default lock mode. How to connect with WebDAV server using USB cable: This can useful when you have USB cable and no network available. 1) On your phone go to Settings->Applications->Development and set option "USB debugging". 2) Connect your phone to your PC using USB cable. 3) Start adb server. On your PC run command "adb start-server". adb is a program that you can find on android sdk. Usually you will find it on android-sdk\platform-tools\adb. 4) Forward needed ports from your PC to your phone. On your PC run command "adb forward tcp:8080 tcp:8080" With this, any connection in your pc to 127.0.0.1:8080 will be forwarded to your phone in port 8080. 5) Run WebDAV server in your phone, open settings and in "Network interfaces" select "Loopback (127.0.0.1)" 6) Start WebDAV server. 7) In your PC connect your WebDAV client to http://127.0.0.1:8080 (port might be different, it depends on your WebDAV Server configuration). Permissions needed: INTERNET ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE ACCESS_WIFI_STATE Network permission to enable server to open network communication with WebDAV clients. WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE Enables WebDAV server write received files from WebDAV clients on sdcard. WAKE_LOCK Keeps phone wake only while server is running. If phone is not wake WebDAV server can not be accessed. Problems with big files: If you have problems handling big files it might be due to a limitation in Windows webdav client. You can try the following to increase the size of files that Windows webdav client is able to manage: 1) You have to turn on BasicAuth via regedit to allow accessing the App's server by username and password. [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\services\WebClient\Parameters] "BasicAuthLevel"=dword:00000002 2) You have to change Window's limit to file size when using the integrated WebDAV client. [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\services\WebClient\Parameters] "FileAttributesLimitInBytes"=dword:000f4240 3) Restart windows. This allows file sizes up to 4 Gigabytes handled by the client.

KNEO 91.7 FM is the official home of Webb City Cardinal and Seneca Indian Athletics. KNEO is a teaching and preaching station that features programs from Focus on the Family, John MacArthur, Charles Stanley, Adrian Rogers, Derek Prince and more. KNEO also features a mixture of Praise and Worship and Southern Gospel music. Learn more information at our website at www.kneo.org

Keyboard Swap is a free app for those of you who love using different keyboards for different tasks. It will allow you to quickly and elegantly toggle between any keyboard installed on your device. With Keyboard Swap you can switch keyboards with any of the 3 different methods: 1 - The notification status bar 2 - A home screen keyboard widget 3 - Launching the Keyboard Swap App It is that simple. Describe it or call it what you want; keyboard selector, keyboard switcher, keyboard manager, keyboard changer, keyboard converter, keyboard transformer, or as I prefer Keyboard Swap. Depending on demand I will create more widgets, more designs and more fun customization and tweaks. So please, if you have an idea or a request please contact me! -Android permissions- Network Communication, System Tools, Your accounts - required by Google cloud messenger. This allows me to send you notifications about updates related to the app and my work. These will be few and far between if at all... a small price to pay for an awesome free app with no adds!

Text Tone allows you to set up contact specific text message notifications. Not only will you know the difference between an email and a text message, you can know who the message is from just by the sound, vibration or light alone! This feature does not exist natively, they simply allow you to choose 1 notification sound for all notifications and all contacts (emails, text messages etc). This App gives you the ability to: -Distinguish text messages from emails and other phone notifications. -Personalize and Organize your text message notifications in ways you haven’t seen before! -Set contact specific text tone sounds and notification bar icons. -Choose to be notified by ringtones or alarm tones instead of a notification sounds. -Choose silent ways to be notified (LED Lights or Vibrations) and still know who the messages are from and how many messages they have sent. -Apply advanced contact specific rules to: *Play the notification sound repeatedly until the message has been acknowledged. *Play the notification sound even if your phone is currently set to silent or vibrate. -Trigger the rule by a key phrase in the text message itself. -Contact the developer from within the app to provide feedback, ask questions, report bugs, and vote on future enhancements. Please note: Until a proper and reliable solution is developed the custom tones and other customizations of this app do not apply to MMS (multi media/picture messages). Instead your systems default texting notification service will be used to deliver these text messages. If you have other SMS apps that handle received messages they may not function properly while running this app. Likewise there may be some text messaging apps out there that will prevent this app from functioning properly. Consider downloading apps like Zedge that can help you acquire free texttones and ringtones to really personalize and customize your texting experience. Explanation for permissions needed: Reading settings and contacts - Fairly obvious, but to be clear the app is only looking at settings regarding your ringer mode state, and your system notification sounds and vibration settings. The only use of the contact information is to assign a rule for that contact. Reading and sending text messages - The app needs to be able to detect when new messages are available and be notified when you have read a message so that the notification can be cleared from the notification bar. The only time the app will ever send a text message is if you choose to contact the developer, and of course it is by your permission, and it will warn you it is about to do this.
release_text: Fixed a bug for Sprint users. Apparently Sprint uses SMS to control and pass data to their visual voicemail application. I don't know why, it seems like they would have better more secure means to do this. For some users on sprint my app may have inadvertently blocked those text messages from updating your visual voicemail and sending notifications regarding new voicemails. This should now be resolved, however please contact me immediately if you find otherwise.

description: Take back Los Angeles city after the invasion of zombies! The story takes place in the Los Angeles metropolitan area. As a survivor, you need to search for a safe haven away from the shuffling hordes of walking zombies! They want to devour any living thing they catch! Your best friend: your M16 rifle and Shotgun. ★★★★★ "Be aware! This game is quite scary!" Features: • Great FPS (First Person Shooter) combat game. • Attack realistic zombies. • Get inside buildings to protect yourself from the hordes of zombies! • Play with two different weapons. Explode the zombies heads! • Play in four different missions, all in a real world environment: - Tutorial Mission: "Warehouse" - Mission 2: "Take Back Los Angeles" - Mission 3: "Save Hollywood" - Mission 4: "Survive!!!" ★★★★★ "The most expected Zombie game for Android!" - The Game Magazine 2013 ★★★★★ Listen to the noises, and take advantage over the undead searching for you ★★★★★ Frequent updates, so the game is always getting better Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/Thetis.Free.Fun.Games

description: iAstronomer is an app with a lot of useful information about Sun and Moon. Following are the features this app has: - Get Sunrise, Sunset information for current as well as any location - Get Moon rise, set information - Get Moon phase and illumination - New, Full and Super moon calendar - Twilight information - Location tools to see current location's map as well as share your location

iAstronomer is an app with a lot of useful information about Sun and Moon. Following are the features this app has: - Get Sunrise, Sunset information for current location - Get Moon rise, set information - Get Moon phase and illumination - New, Full and Super moon calendar - Twilight information - Location tools to see current location's map as well as share your location

*** It's recommended to try the free version of this app, "Photographer's Tools Free" before upgrading *** "Photographer's Tools Pro" is a mobile app for both Pro and amateur photographs with a lot of useful tools and features. Following is a quick summary of what this application provides. - Ability to calculate Hyperfocal distance and Depth of field. This is a very useful tool especially for landscape photographers who may want an interesting foreground, distant background - and everything in between - to be in sharp focus. - Find Sunrise/Sunset and Moonrise/Moonset timings so that you can be at the location on time. - Get Moon phase information - Find civil and nautical twilight timings along with Blue and Golden hours. Sometimes the best light is before sunrise or after sunset and this tool tells you how long before sunrise you may want to get to the location or for how long after sunset you can expect good light. - Calculate exposure adjustment when using ND filters of various densities. - Gray card tool for setting your custom white balance. Also useful for setting exposure.
release_text: - Minor bug fixes Please use "Provide Feedback" option under menu to report any problems or suggest enhancements.

description: Quick Calendar Event is an App for anyone who wants to track time using Android smartphones or tablets, that uses Google Calendar as a base and provides an easy way for time recording With this app you can quickly and easily generate pre-defined events in your Google Calendar. The calendar events can either have an open end or be completed immediately. Events with "open end" can be completed later. The idea is to use the Google Calendar as a simple time tracking tool. Or just use this app to quickly enter calendar events. Of course, you can choose a (sub)calendar that will be used with this app. You should choose a calendar fist! In App: Menu -> calendar. This is the paid version of "Quick Calendar Event Free". This app has no advertising, no internet access and an additional feature - ★ restore of categories from backup-files. Web: http://think-android.com
release_text: Quick Calendar Event 1.5.1 - UI improvements for large screens

description: The Graphics Maker by Laughingbird Software: The easy and fun way to create graphics for marketing your products and services! No clip art here! Only professionally designed graphics! -Who can use the Graphics Maker? Businesses, marketers, entrepreneurs, artists, teams, bloggers, website owners, organizations, social media fans...the list goes on! -What can it make? Logos, buttons, "discount" badges, headers, diagrams, ads, e-book covers, splash pages, call-to-action and sales pages, banners, video intros, email headers, email signatures and background images...just use your imagination! -Where can the graphics be used? Websites, Advertisements, Mobile Apps, Blogs, Forums, Virtual books and boxes, Business Cards, Letterhead, Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Picasso, eMail, Presentations, iMovie...anywhere you see graphics on the web! Sell your designs to others! Brand your business on-the-go using professional graphics now. FEATURES: • Includes ROYALTY FREE images and objects designed by professional graphic artists! Cartoon characters, orbs, swooshes, "Web2.0" graphics and more! • Use the Graphic Makers' professional graphics (included) AND import other photos and images. You can even add images directly from your camera! • Adjust and modify each customizable template with our easy "drag and drop" method using just your fingers! Choose backgrounds, text and object colors as well as add outlines, shadows, gradients and more. • Pinch, drag and spin each logo or graphic element to change size. • Save your designs and graphics to your Photo Gallery. Then eMail them or create your own company wallpaper. You can even send it to your Facebook account! • Use The Graphics Makers' creative text editor. Overlay images with text in different sizes and colors. Create fun and unique eMail signatures! • Fun features: Place your logo onto virtual billboards, trade show booth images and more, all included in The Graphics Maker! Send these images to your friends and show them how important your company is. Grab the Graphics Maker today and start creating graphics you'll be proud of!
release_text: The Graphics Maker is a new app from Laughingbird Software!

description: "Looking for something different to spice up your phone or tablet… then try this app!" -androidtapp.com Bring your Android device alive with flowering vines. Truly a unique and beautiful live wallpaper. Watch as these vines randomly grow and sprout flowers, and then pass away, as new ones grow to take their place. With an almost artistic feel, this wallpaper will never be dull to look at. Experience different patterns and shapes every time you turn on your device. Looks great on phones and tablets.

Sensor Fusion as provided by Paul Lawitzki at thousand-thoughts.com but with some visual additions by me. Fuse accelerometer, magnetometer and gyroscope into one sensor. You will need a fast platform (1 GHz+, maybe even multi core) to get a good impression of what happens with azimuth, roll and pitch. It will run on devices without gyroscope but the displayed values stay 0. The source code can be downloaded from the above site or from my site.

This is a short anthology of passages from the Jewish wisdom literature of the Talmud and Midrash, part of the Wisdom of the East series. Unlike some similar compilations, Collins documents where possible the source of his quotations. He also apparently translated from the originals rather than reusing existing English renderings. * Fullscreen mode. * Easy and simple to use layout with page animations. * Choose from a wide variety of customisable themes. * Small lightweight size. * Contains advertisements from www.webdefine.co.uk and other companies For support of this application please either email info@webdefine.co.uk or visit www.webdefine.co.uk

Com o Vivo Play você se diverte dentro e fora de casa. São milhares de filmes, séries e shows só esperando você dar um play. Você pausa, volta, avança e assiste à cena de que mais gosta de novo e ainda tem a opção de alugar lançamentos e conteúdos recentes. A toda hora e em qualquer lugar. No computador, smartphones e tablets. Para ser um usuário do Vivo Play basta ser assinante Vivo TV Fibra e fazer seu cadastro. O acesso será totalmente grátis. Baixe agora o aplicativo Vivo Play, insira seu usuário e senha. Para clientes Vivo TV Fibra, cadastre seu usuário e senha através do botão MENU do controle remoto, escolha a opção "Vivo Play" e em seguida escolha a opção "Ver fora de casa". Insira um e-mail e senha válidos e clique em "Ativar". Se quiser acessar pelo computador, acesse www.vivoplay-vivo.com.br e insira seu usuário e senha cadastrados. Recomendamos que você tenha acesso a uma banda larga com velocidade mínima de 2 Mbps para melhor experiência. Para dúvidas ou informações, clientes Vivo TV Fibra podem entrar em contato com a Central de Atendimento ao Cliente pelo 106 15. Demais clientes, pelo 1058. Portadores de necessidades especiais de fala ou audição, pelo 142. Nosso atendimento está à sua disposição 24 horas por dia, todos os dias da semana. Android mínimo necessário: 4.0. Aparelhos com versão de software não original (root) possivelmente terão problema ao reproduzir conteúdos. With Vivo Play you have fun inside and outside the home. There are thousands of movies, series and shows just hoping you make a play. You pause, back, forward and watch the scene more like new and still has the option of renting releases and recent content. At all times and everywhere. On the computer, smartphones and tablets. To be one of Vivo Play user simply be subscribed to Live TV Fiber and make your registration. Access will be totally free. Download now Vivo Play application, enter your username and password. For customers Live TV Fiber, submit your username and password via the MENU button on the remote control, choose the "Vivo Play" and then choose "Check out 'option. Enter an email address and valid password and click "Enable." If you want to access the computer, access www.vivoplay-vivo.com.br and submit your username and password registered. We recommend that you have access to a broadband with a minimum speed of 2 Mbps for best experience. For questions or information, Live TV Fiber Customers can contact the Central Customer Service at 106 15 Other customers by 1058. People with special speech or hearing needs, at 142. Our service is at your disposal 24 hours a day, every day of the week. Android minimum: 4.0. Devices with non-genuine software version (root) possibly have problem to play content.

description: Play-Asia.com was established in 2002 and is a leading online retailer providing video games, DVDs, music CDs, gadgets and toys. Our Vision Play-Asia.com is committed to be the leading Hong Kong online retailer of entertainment products. Our professional staff will work together to build a progressive and successful commercial corporation through a commitment to high levels of customer satisfaction. Our Mission We aim to provide: • Satisfactory customer service • Large variety and selection of merchandise • Quick delivery times • Competitive prices Play-Asia.com prides itself in providing customer satisfaction. We take all measures to have your inquiries answered within a few hours and not exceeding 24hrs (except on weekends). Our highly trained staff is happy to answer any questions that you may have. Play-Asia.com uses its own e-commerce solution for its website which provides ease of use, high security and data protection. Rest assured your information is safe with us. Play-Asia.com focuses on Hong Kong and the Asia-Pacific region but also offers selected items for worldwide shipping.

*NEW & IMPROVED* - The Time Timer for Android App is finally stable! We listened and delivered a rebuilt app. It now has the same levels of quality, performance and function that have helped define the award-winning Time Timer brand for nearly 20 years. We sincerely appreciate your feedback, loyalty and patience! Thank you. Use the Time Timer for Android App to create and save timers for the activities you do every day, like morning routines, meetings, projects and children's activities, or quickly customise a new Timer whenever you need it. Recommended by experts in education, professional organising, healthcare, ADHD/ Autism and parenting, this App is packed with features: --Name and customise your Timers. --Save Timers to use again. --Use Quick Start to create a Timer in seconds. --Automatically repeat timers up to 16 times. --Choose alarm or vibrate to signal time is up. --View each Timer full-screen – or see up to four at once. --Ability to display time digitally. --Awake Mode prevents device falling asleep while Timers are running! There are Three Timer Modes: --Original (60-minute) Timer: The red disk represents 60 minutes. --Custom Timer: The disk represents any amount of time – seconds, minutes or hours. (Perfect for interval sessions!) --Clock: The disk appears on a clock face. Use the Time Timer App in:+ BUSINESS: time your meetings, projects and presentations. Use Clock Mode to see your whole working day!+ EDUCATION: teach a child what "five minutes" looks like with this visual timer. Help older students manage homework & tests without the stress of a numerical countdown.+ FAMILY: keep the family moving by timing housework, gardening, homework, time-outs and computer/TV time.+ HEALTHCARE: time your medications and workouts! Comfort a child during a medical procedure by showing how much time is left.+ SPECIAL NEEDS: discover the profound impact that the Time Timer can have on ADHD, Autism, Dyslexia and diverse special needs.+ LIFE: beat the clock! Motivate yourself to keep going until the red disk has gone and time is up! Special Note: Time Timer would like to thank everyone who has shared their reviews of our app – both the positive and the negative. We took that feedback and delivered a dramatically improved Time Timer for Android App that fixes the problems that you have experienced in the past. We want to have great reviews of our app on Google Play…this is our first step to earning those types of reviews. Please try this significantly improved version – and then we want to hear from you again about how we did. Thank you. Questions? support@timetimer.com Find more Time Timer products at http://timetimer.com
release_text: NEW Version 2 visual timer app for Android! If you like pairs or memory-games, you will love this one. Falling cards coming in waves, or cards sliding over chutes. Find the pairs before they touch the ground! Up to four players on the same device. Special mode for one player. Collect the pairs with as less mistakes as possible to earn highscore or solve waves of cards. Four game modes: Static, Stack, Waves and Chute Wave: The cards are falling down. Can you clear the cards fast enough before they touch the ground? Chute: The cards slide down criss-cross over chutes. Remove all before they reach the ground. Stack: The cards are stacked. Remove one from a stack and the ones upon will fall down. Different decks: Flowers, Colors, Animals and Math. Play combos for bonus points and joker. Three difficulties. Train your short term memory while having fun! The full version contains the gamemode chute and two additional difficulties to play faster and with more (up to 42) cards.
